The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by the duo of Nikola Vucevic and Victor Oladipo . Vucevic was a force in this game , going 10 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding 15 rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 14 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 24 points and 18 rebounds on the year . Jeff Teague was able to post a double - double , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , seven assists and two steals . While he did n't reach his season average of 17 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Tobias Harris , who recorded 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 37 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Monday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 22 - 21 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 41 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Giannis Antetokounmpo backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Pachulia recorded 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . He also had three assists , two steals and two blocked shots , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . Also , coming off the bench , Kendall Marshall had 10 points and five rebounds , while Jason Smith was the only other Knicks ' player in double figures with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) as well . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 102 - 91 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday . This game meant much more to Memphis than the Suns and that proved to be the case with this important Memphis win . The Suns shot 50 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while holding the Suns to 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from long range . Rebounding was also decisive , with Memphis winning that battle , 37 - 35 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists and committing three less turnovers . The Suns ( 3 - 2 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Eric Bledsoe continued his great play , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds and four assists . Markieff Morris was second on the team , with his 20 points and five boards . Zach Randolph was huge off the bench , providing 10 points and six rebounds . Zach Morris , Gerald Green and Gerald Green all scored 20 points a piece . On deck for the Suns is a home matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . The Suns ( 3 - 2 ) were undefeated in their home building coming into this , but folded late in the fourth quarter . Markieff Morris led the team in scoring , as he totaled 20 points , five rebounds and two steals off the bench . Courtney Lee also played well off the bench , amassing 15 points , three rebounds and two assists . Phoenix will look to build off this win on Wednesday against the Portland Trail Blazers for their next game .

The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 49 percent from the floor and a meager 58 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons also forced the Bucks into 21 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own . The Pistons were led by the duo of Andre Drummond and Khris Middleton . Middleton shot 11 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Jackson on the other hand shot 6 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding eight assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Tobias Harris finished with 15 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists in 35 minutes . The only other Buck reaching double figures in points was Greg Monroe , who posted 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .
Giannis Antetokounmpo has been a model of consistency for the Bucks all season long and Monday night was his most impressive performance of the season , as he posted 34 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and five steals . The 34 points was a season - high , while the 12 rebounds was his second highest total of the season . Tuesday also marked the second time this year Antetokounmpo recorded 20 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and five steals as he continues to stuff the stat sheet as well as any player in the NBA . However , it was the play of Michael Beasley that may have been just as , if not more , important for Milwaukee 's upset victory . Beasley 's 17 points Tuesday night were his second highest total of the season and the seventh time he has reach double - digit scoring . In those four games , the Bucks are 6 - 1 , as Beasley 's contributions off the bench have had a positive effect on Milwaukee 's offensive attack . Cleveland will host the Pistons on Saturday , while the Cavaliers will visit Phoenix on Sunday . Meanwhile , the Cavaliers will travel to Boston on Thursday to face the Celtics , while the Cavaliers will host the Cavaliers on Sunday . Meanwhile , the Cavaliers ( 13 - 3 ) have been one of the most dysfunctional teams over recent weeks , but wins like this will surely quiet the skeptics for the time being . Kyrie Irving led the team in scoring , dropping 20 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , adding three assists and his three rebounds . Jabari Parker was second on the team , scoring 18 points to go along with four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Kevin Love finished with 13 points , 13 rebounds and two assists .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Wednesday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 40 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 39 percent from the floor and 13 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Celtics into 32 turnovers , while only committing eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his triple - double . He finished with 27 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and eight assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . He shot 8 - for - 19 from the floor and 2 - for - 5 from beyond the arc to score 27 points . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Saturday . Oklahoma City has won two straight and seven of their last eight games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Bucks ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Bucks continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Kevin Durant scored a team - high 23 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from the field to go with nine rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Reggie Jackson had 18 points , seven rebounds and three assists on 8 - of - 14 shooting in just 30 minutes of action . Serge Ibaka recorded his second double - double in four games , scoring 15 points and pulling in five rebounds in 24 minutes . Khris Middleton ( ankle ) sat out for the second straight game . The Bucks shot 41 percent from the field , 19 percent from beyond the arc and 83 percent from the free - throw line . Jerryd Bayless added 11 points in 20 minutes off the bench . Milwaukee will go on the road to face the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . Milwaukee has been trading wins and losses like coin flips over their last eight games , going 2 - 6 in that stretch . Both teams struggled from the field Wednesday , but the Bucks failed to shoot an even 37 percent from the field and limped to a brutal 19 percent clip from deep . The Thunder , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference playoff standings . The Thunder have won the season series with the Bucks 1 - 0 .

The key for Atlanta was their shooting , as they shot 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding battle , winning that battle , 64 - 0 . The Hawks were unconscious from the field , as they shot 44 percent from the field , 32 percent from three - point range and 70 percent from the free - throw line . The Hawks also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 64 - 63 . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Hawks , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the game . The Hawks will look to build off this win on Wednesday against the Orlando Magic .
The host Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Warriors ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .

The Minnesota Grizzlies ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) 105 - 101 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minnesota . The Timberwolves were very efficient in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 45 percent from the floor and just 50 percent from beyond the arc . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 17 rebounds per game . He was very efficient in his time on the court , scoring a game - high of 34 points ( 12 - 17 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 34 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Washington Wizards , 117 - 80 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Nets ( 37 - 42 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and to complete a season sweep of the Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) . Given that they 'd blasted Washington by 50 points in their most recent meeting , it appeared the chances for another win were high . The hosts had other plans , though , as they jumped out to a 54 - 48 halftime lead . Their stellar 51 percent shooting helped them stave off a second - half comeback from the Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) , which outscored them by a 58 - 46 margin over the third and fourth quarters . The visitors were led by Bradley Beal 's 24 points , which he supplemented with three assists , three rebounds , a steal and a block . Bradley Beal followed with 24 points , three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Deron Williams and Jarrett Jack turned in matching 9 - point efforts , with the former adding nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal , and the latter providing two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jarrett Jack was productive as a reserve as well with 14 points , three assists and one rebound . Brook Lopez paced the Wizards with 26 points , nine rebounds , one steal and one block . Marcin Gortat posted a 21 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Deron Williams tallied nine points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points , three boards and three assists . Bojan Bogdanovic 's 22 points led the way for Washington , and he added three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic provided 14 points , five boards , three assists and one block . Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . Paul Pierce was right behind him with 26 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Deron Williams and Jarrett Jack turned in matching 9 - point efforts , with the former adding nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal , and the latter providing seven rebounds , nine assists and one steal . Thaddeus Young totaled 10 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Joe Johnson led the second unit with 14 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Nets head to the Big Apple to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening .

He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . The Portland Mavericks ( 20 - 30 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 22 - 29 ) 108 - 104 on Friday . It 's bizarre to see a team well under .500 favored by double - digits over a team well above .500 , but circumstances made that the case in this matchup . Portland is without their top - three scorers and two point guards and have now lost their fourth - straight game . The Blazers took care of business in the fourth quarter though , as they held the Trail Blazers to just 9 points in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Trail Blazers recorded 15 assists and nine turnovers , while the Trail Blazers committed just nine turnovers to their 16 assists . The Trail Blazers had to play this game without Deron Bosh and Chris Bosh and didn’t miss a beat . Yogi Ferrell had a good game , as he tallied 28 points , six assists and seven rebounds in the victory . Evan Turner led the team with 24 points and also brought down four boards . Damian Lillard had a nice all - around game as well , as he accumulated 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists in the defeat . Up next for the Trail Blazers is a date with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday . The Trail Blazers have been struggling mightily recently and this performance is indicative of their form since the All-Star break , as they 've lost seven of their last eight . Damian Lillard did all he could for Portland , as he led the team with 32 points and six assists . Harrison Barnes was second on the team , as he scored 13 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting . Dirk Nowitzki scored just nine points , but provided seven rebounds and two assists in the defeat . On deck for the Trail Blazers is a matchup with the Utah Jazz on Sunday .

The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Griffin 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 88 - 69 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Magic ( 4 - 7 ) to a 32 percent success rate from the field and a 20 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . The key for the Pacers was their play in the two middle quarters , as they outscored the visitors by a 42 - 30 margin in the final period . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 126 - 98 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday . This game meant much more to the Nets than the Suns and that proved to be the case with this important Brooklyn win . The Nets really took it to the Suns in the fourth quarter , winning it , 33 - 33 . Shooting was key , with Brooklyn hitting 45 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . Brook Lopez led the way for Phoenix , as he collected 19 points and six rebounds . Tyler Ulis finished second on the team , accruing 10 points , five rebounds and 12 assists . Alex Len totaled 11 points , six rebounds and two steals . Leandro McDaniels came off the bench to provide 14 points , six rebounds and two steals . Devin Booker led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 28 points , two rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Brook Lopez finished with 19 points , six rebounds and two blocks . K.J . McDaniels led the bench with 16 points and eight rebounds . The Suns ( 22 - 56 ) continue to battle for a playoff berth and wins like this over teams who are ahead of them are imperative for that pursuit . Devin Booker led Phoenix in scoring , as he tallied 23 points , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Alex Len recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . On deck for the Nets is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 103 , at Golden 2 Center on Sunday . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Sacramento forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 13 turnovers and made the shots when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 22 points , 11 rebounds , a pair of assists and a steal . Meanwhile , the dynamic duo of Eric Bledsoe and Darren Collison put on a pair of spectacular dueling performances , with the former posting 33 points , two assists , two rebounds and two steals , while the latter handed out four assists , hauled in six rebounds and recorded a steal . Warren followed with a 21 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a steal . Ty Lawson provided 18 points , three assists , five rebounds and two steals in a reserve role as well . Eric Lawson led the way for Sacramento with 20 points , four rebounds , four assists and a steal . TJ Warren and Ben McLemore followed with matching 21 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter supplying seven assists , two rebounds and one steal . Brandon Knight led the second unit with 12 points , one rebound and one assist . The Kings head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Kings remain home and await the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday evening as well .
The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 44 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Clippers into 12 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jamal Crawford was the star of the show , as he went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 17 rebounds on the season . Jimmy Butler was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points . He finished with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven assists , while Hinrich provided 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 103 , at Barclays Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) built a 62 - 51 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Memphis eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Grizzlies managed to shoot 51 percent from the field overall , as well as a superb 41 percent on behind the arc . Marc Gasol and Mike Conley led the way with matching 32 - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , and the latter providing eight assists , three rebounds and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie supplied 14 points , three rebounds and one assist . JaMychal Green had a near double - double with 10 points , six rebounds and one steal . Mike Bogdanovic led the second unit with 11 points , two rebounds and two assists . Sean Kilpatrick was productive as a reserve as well with 15 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Mike Conley led the way for Brooklyn with 32 points , six assists , one rebound and one steal . Gasol supplied a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie led the first unit with 14 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson posted a 13 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks , two steals and one assist . Vince Carter provided 14 points , three boards , an assist and two steals in a reserve role as well . Mike Conley led the way for Brooklyn with 32 points , six assists , one rebound and one steal . Backcourt mate Mike Conley followed with 32 points , six assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Lopez posted 17 points , three rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson posted a 13 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and one block . Sean Kilpatrick led the second unit with 15 points , six rebounds and three assists .
The Miami Heat defeated the Eric Gordon , 117 - 100 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . Miami was expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run for them to prevail . In fact , the Heat led for the final 42 minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of that stretch . Shooting was key , with the Heat shooting 52 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . The Rockets could only muster up 27 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Heat recording 27 assists to 11 turnovers , while the Rockets committed 15 turnovers to just 22 assists . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 38 points , 12 rebounds and 12 assists . Dion Waiters was huge off the bench , providing 23 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Hassan Whiteside was the player of the game , as he totaled 23 points and 14 rebounds on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , amassing 23 points , 14 rebounds and five blocks on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Goran Dragic finished with 21 points , five rebounds and five assists . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , amassing 12 points and two rebounds . Rodney McGruder and Rodney McGruder also scored in double figures off the bench , combining for 27 points , six rebounds and five assists .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . New Orleans was desperate for a win and this dominating victory inches them a little closer to the eight - seed in the west . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarter , as they outscored Detroit , 62 - 34 . The Pistons had one of the worst shooting games of the season , as they went 40 - of - 103 from the field , 3 - of - 17 from the free - throw line and 3 - of - 23 from three - point range . The Pelicans shot well on their end , hitting 50 percent of their shots , while going 22 - of - 23 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 45 - 40 . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had won three of four headed into this matchup , so this 23 - point loss is obviously disappointing . Jon Leuer led Detroit , as he collected 22 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Andre Drummond did get ejected , but still totaled 13 points and 17 rebounds , despite going 1 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . Tobias Harris led the bench with 15 points and six rebounds . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) were 0 - 3 with DeMarcus Cousins and this marks their first win since the trade , despite the fact that Cousins was suspended for this matchup ( technicals ) . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 33 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and five assists . Dante Cunningham was a surprise , providing 16 points and five rebounds .
The Denver Nuggets ( 19 - 27 ) beat the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 22 ) 93 - 85 on Friday . Anthony Davis had a special game , in which he led his team in all five major statistical categories . He had 24 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Davis is averaging 21 points and 9 rebounds over his last five games . Anthony Davis had 24 points , 12 rebounds and two blocks against the Pelicans . Ryan Anderson ( 11 ) was the only other New Orleans starter to score in double figures . J.J. Hickson played 19 minutes . The Pelicans shot 46 percent from the floor and 59 percent from beyond the arc . Denver will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . New Orleans has been trading wins and losses like coin flips over their last eight games , going 4 - 2 in that stretch . Both teams struggled from the field Wednesday , but the Pelicans failed with flair on offense , shooting just 39 percent from the field and 20 percent from beyond the arc while giving up 19 easy points off of 22 turnovers . Anthony Davis did his best to carry the team , finishing with 24 points , 12 rebounds and two blocks , but it was n't enough to make up for the lackluster efforts from most of his teammates . The Pelicans have a good chance to gain a win in the West Friday when they host the Suns . New Orleans has two days off before hosting the Phoenix Suns on Friday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Golden State Warriors , 117 - 97 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) came in losers of two straight and looking for an immediate improvement of a porous defense that had allowed an average of 110 points coming in . They were able to right both matters for the moment Monday , stifling the Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) to the tune of a season - low point total . Kevin Durant and Kevin Durant led the way for Los Angeles with a combined 63 points , and the Lakers ' bench tallied 45 points overall . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 20 points , four assists , two rebounds , three steals and a block over 26 minutes . Draymond Green was next with a 16 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and four steals . Larry Nance , Jr. was right behind him with 12 points , three rebounds and one steal . Nick Looney led the bench with 11 points , five rebounds and two assists . Stephen Curry and Stephen Curry put forth a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding an assist and two steals , and the latter offering nine rebounds , four assists and four steals . Draymond Green filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , nine rebounds , four assists and four steals . Shaun Livingston matched Green 's scoring total while leading the bench , adding an assist , three rebounds and a block . The Lakers remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are just a game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night .
The Houston Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) took care of business against the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 38 ) on Thursday in a 133 - 102 win . The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from deep , as they shot 49 percent from the field , 50 percent from three - point range and 77 percent from the free - throw line . The Rockets also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 55 - 42 . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 40 points , six rebounds and 8 assists . Patrick Beverley finished second on the team , totaling 18 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Tyler Ulis provided 13 points and six assists of his own off the bench . On deck for Houston is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday . The Suns ( 17 - 38 ) came into this fixture in the midst of a two - game losing streak , so a matchup against the Suns is just what the doctor ordered . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Patrick Booker was second on the team , with his 18 points and four boards . Alex Len recorded a double - double , amassing 13 points and nine rebounds . Sam Dekker and Leandro Barbosa each scored 12 points a piece .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 20 - 26 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 37 ) 121 - 103 at Moda Center on Sunday . Damian Lillard continues to solidify his place as one of the best fourth quarter players in the NBA after driving to the rim twice in the waning minutes of the final period , which put the Blazers in the win column once again . Lillard put forth his fourth straight 36 - plus point performance , and although he fell short of his explosive 51 points against the Golden State Warriors , he did score 36 points on 14 - of - 19 shooting , the majority of which came in the second half . The final four minutes of regulation mostly came down to a defensive battle , where both teams earned stop after stop to keep their chances of winning in tact , which came to be the theme of the matchup that resulted in 8 lead changes and 12 times both teams were dead even . CJ McCollum led all scorers with a balanced game in both halves of play , scoring 28 points , to go along with three assists and three rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Portland was unable to pressure the perimeter , and even if they did , the Blazers attacked the glass , out - rebounding the Lakers 42 - 30 . All five starters scored in double digits , as Lou Williams ( 16 ) was the only other player to score in double figures for the Lakers . Up next , the Trail Blazers will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Lakers will stay home to host the Cavaliers on Wednesday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 6 - 5 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 10 ) 99 - 89 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot better than the Pistons , going 48 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 37 percent from the floor and just 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were able to force the Pistons into 12 turnovers , while committing just nine of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jeff Teague led the way , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on all eight attempts . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Hawks , as he 's averaging only 12 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Paul Millsap finished with 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) , 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Kyle Korver , who recorded 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and four rebounds in 36 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 107 - 103 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . While there were n't many swings in this game , it stayed close throughout . In fact , there were only two lead changes and one tie , as it took some clutch free - throws from the Knicks to close things out . New York actually held the lead for the final three quarters , as the Knicks could never quite crawl back in . Defense was key for New York , as they held the Trail Blazers to 44 percent shooting and forced them to commit 16 turnovers . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with the Knicks recording 26 assists to 13 turnovers , while the Trail Blazers committed 16 turnovers to just 18 assists . Kristaps Porzingis led the Knicks in scoring , as he tallied 31 points , nine rebounds and three blocks . Derrick Rose finished second on the team , collecting 18 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals . No one else on the roster had more than 10 points or four assists . The Knicks will host the New York Knicks on Thursday for their next game . The Knicks ( 7 - 7 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 9 tries . Kristaps Porzingis was the player of the game , as he accumulated 31 points , nine rebounds and three blocks on 13 - of - 23 shooting . Derrick Rose finished second on the team , accruing 18 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals . Mason Plumlee was the only other starter in double figures , tallying 14 points and nine rebounds . Evan Turner and Evan Turner both scored in double figures off the bench , combining for 23 points , seven rebounds and five assists .
The New York Knicks ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 3 - 2 ) 117 - 104 on Tuesday . In a battle of winless teams , the Knicks took down the Bulls in a poorly played game . The two teams battled turnover problems and defensive struggles all game long , with poor offensive execution hurting both teams . The Knicks defense was especially lackluster , as they allowed an ugly 56 points in the paint . They 'll need to sure up their defense if they want to get out of this deep hole they are digging . New York has been better recently , but they were able to pull out a huge win on the road against an elite Chicago defense . The offense was spectacular , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range . They were extremely efficient as well , with the Bulls going 44 percent to the Bulls 44 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game though , as the Knicks recorded 32 assists on 40 made baskets , while the Bulls could n't crack 34 percent shooting . The Knicks have been one of the surprises of the NBA this season and the all - around play of Dwyane Wade is this game . Wade was the star of the game , as he tallied 35 points , 10 rebounds and six assists in the win . Joakim Noah also played well , as he totaled 16 points , nine rebounds and three steals . Nikola Mirotic also played well off the bench , as he amassed 14 points and six rebounds . On deck for the Knicks is a matchup with the Utah Jazz on Sunday .
The New York Knicks ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 0 - 1 ) 122 - 97 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in New York . The Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 35 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks also forced the Bucks into 18 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own . The Knicks were led by Greg Monroe , who went 7 - for - 17 from the field and 8 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score 22 points . He also had 14 rebounds , giving him his second double - double in the last three games . He 's now averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds on the season . Carmelo Anthony also had a solid showing , posting 20 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , five rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 3 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Greivis Vasquez had a strong game , scoring 18 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) in 29 minutes . He 's now reached double figures in scoring during two out of his last three games , despite averaging only 5 points per game this season . The Bucks received a nice contribution off the bench from Greivis Vasquez . He went 4 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding seven rebounds . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 25 - 15 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 19 ) 106 - 103 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Raptors did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 39 percent compared to the Magic , who went 39 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Magic into 15 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Victor Oladipo had a solid game as well . He went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 20 rebounds on the year . DeMar DeRozan had a strong showing of his own , scoring 13 points ( 4 - 19 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and handing out four assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Jason Smith had a strong showing . In 37 minutes he finished with 16 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and five rebounds , while Patrick Patterson had 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) of his own . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the HOrnets on Saturday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Boston Celtics , 105 - 99 , at TD Garden on Friday evening . The Bulls ( 1 - 1 ) utilized a balanced attack and a solid shooting night to withstand a strong push from the Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) in the middle quarters . Jimmy Butler led the way with a game - high 25 points , while Dwyane Wade checked in with 22 points of his own on 7 - for - 18 shooting . He added seven rebounds , five assists and a pair of steals . Taj Gibson and Avery Bradley turned in a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds and five assists , and the latter posting six rebounds , five assists and a block . Rajon Rondo turned in four points , nine assists , six rebounds and two steals . Rajon Rondo was next with a modest seven points , which he complemented with nine assists , six rebounds and two steals . However , Rajon Rondo ( five points , nine assists , six rebounds ) and Michael Carter-Williams ( five points , six rebounds , nine assists ) were n't able to provide much on the scoreboard . Thomas led the way for the Celtics with 25 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Wade contributed 22 points , six boards and five assists . Jae Crowder supplied 14 points , six rebounds , an assist and two steals , while Al Horford contributed 11 points , seven rebounds , five assists and a block . Amir Johnson made the start for Al Horford ( groin ) , managing 15 points , six rebounds , an assist and two steals . Robin Lopez provided a 11 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included five assists . D.J . Rozier led the bench with eight points in 23 minutes .

Corey Brewer was the only other Dallas starter to score in double figures with 14 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt ) . The Mavericks offense sputtered despite a solid 23 - 25 ( 40 percent ) shooting performance from three - point land , as they just couldn’t get it going inside . Dallas shot 41 percent from the field and just 40 percent from beyond the arc . James Harden led all scorers with 33 points ( 14 - 23 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and added five assists and four rebounds in 39 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki scored 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) and added five assists and five rebounds in 40 minutes . The Rockets now try to end their losing streak against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night at home .

This game was close throughout though , as there were 13 ties and 24 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . Rebounding was key for Denver , as they won that battle , 56 - 48 . The Hornets came in to the game with a simple mission ; prevail over a significantly undermanned Hornets squad and by doing so , clinch the final Eastern Conference playoff spot . The outcome was seemingly never in question , as Charlotte jumped out to a 26 - 26 lead after one quarter . However , the Hornets hung strong in the second quarter , outscoring the Heat by a 28 - 21 margin during the period . The Heat outscored the visitors by a margin of 58 - 17 over the second and third quarters , causing them to make a run in the second half . The Hornets were led by Luol Deng 's 22 points , which he complemented with nine rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Hassan Whiteside was next with a 17 - point , seven - rebound double - double that also included a steal . Dwyane Wade filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , three rebounds , three assists and a block . Joe Johnson paced the Hornets bench with 13 points , three rebounds , four assists and a block . Miami remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Monday night . They 're home again on Friday to take on the Atlanta Hawks .

The Orlando Magic defeated the Chicago Bulls , 97 - 98 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 16 - 38 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Orlando has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The Magic ( 32 - 38 ) were the latest unit to learn that lesson the hard way , as they first saw the Bulls storm back from a 32 - 16 first - quarter deficit to forge a six - point halftime lead by outscoring Orlando , 29 - 18 , in the fourth quarter . The Magic shot 47 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while seeing six players hit double digits in the scoring column . The T-Wolves were actually paced by Pau Gasol , who managed 25 points , 15 boards , four assists and a steal . Victor Oladipo followed with 18 points , four rebounds , six assists , two steals and a block . Nikola Vucevic generated a 14 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . Elfrid Payton supplied 10 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Channing Frye led the second unit with 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . Gasol paced the Magic with 25 points , which he supplemented with 15 rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Victor Oladipo tallied 18 points , four rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block . Harris followed with a near double - double of 15 points , eight rebounds , an assist and three steals . Elfrid Payton posted a 10 - point , 9 - assist double - double that also included nine rebounds and two steals . Channing Frye led the second unit with 12 points , one rebound and two assists . The Bulls head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Magic remain home to face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday evening .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) , managing a 44 percent success rate from the floor and 32 percent from three - point range . They also elicited 9 turnovers from the Bulls , while holding Chicago to a 40 percent success rate from beyond the arc . Nicolas Batum ( 20 points ) , Nicolas Batum ( 20 points ) and Nicolas Batum ( 12 points ) , who provided 12 rebounds , an assist , and a block ) posted a highly productive 52 percent success rate from the field . The Bulls were led by Nicolas Batum 's 20 points , which he supplemented with 11 rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Dwyane Wade was next with 12 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist contributed a 12 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , four blocks and one steal . Frank Kaminsky led the second unit with 13 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . The Bulls head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Saturday night , while the Bulls remain home to face the Detroit Pistons on Friday evening .
It took a lot of big shots to get to overtime , as there were 10 ties in this OT thriller . Devin Booker tied the game twice in the final 32 seconds , as his 34 points were a career - high . Many of the statistics were lopsided , but the biggest differential was in the blocks department , as the Hawks swatted away 13 shots to the Suns two . Atlanta also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 50 - 51 . The Suns ( 20 - 58 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Devin Booker led the team in scoring , as he tallied 34 points , five rebounds and two steals . Jeff Teague was second on the team , finishing with 20 points , two rebounds and two assists . Paul Millsap went just 3 - of - 8 from the field , but finished with 13 points , 17 rebounds and three steals . Mirza Teletovic was unconscious off the bench , providing 12 points and seven rebounds on 4 - of - 9 shooting . Atlanta will be in action again on Saturday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks . The Hawks ( 46 - 32 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Jeff Booker led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 20 points , two rebounds and two assists . Al Horford finished second on the team , totaling 16 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kyle Korver amassed 11 points , three rebounds and five assists .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 129 - 109 , at Target Center on Wednesday evening . The Nets ( 9 - 38 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Minnesota has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The Timberwolves ( 9 - 38 ) were led by a pair of 23 - point efforts from Karl-Anthony Lopez and Andrew Wiggins , with the former adding seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter supplying four assists , three rebounds , a steal and a block . Ricky Rubio went for 14 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Ricky Rubio managed a 14 - point , 6 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds and one steal . Sean Kilpatrick led the second unit with 18 points , seven boards , one assist and one block . Ricky Rubio tallied a full stat line of 14 points , six assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block . Shabazz Muhammad led the second unit with 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Andrew Wiggins paced the T-Wolves with 23 points , three rebounds , four assists and one steal . Zach LaVine led the bench with 18 points , while Zach LaVine led the second unit with 18 points .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) , 121 - 94 , in Game 4 on Monday at the Oracle Arena to take Game 2 of the NBA Finals . Golden State 's Stephen Harden has been phenomenal as the Warriors have surged to third in the Western Conference , and the All-Star guard does not seem to be letting up . The superstar 's replacement , the `` Greek Freak '' Antetenkoumpo contributed a season - high 22 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting from the field . For the Rockets , it was a fairly uninspired performance , and it started with their star big man Dwight Howard . However , the Frenchman upheld his workload from Iguodala 's help , Iguodala finished with 17 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting from the field . Klay Thompson added 23 points , while Dwight Howard recorded a double - double with 15 points and 15 rebounds . The Warriors ' next game is at home Monday against the New Orleans Pelicans . The Rockets will complete a back - to - back set on the road Sunday against the New York Knicks . The Rockets saw their three - game win streak come to an end with the loss . Nearly all of the Rockets ' key players struggled to finish on offense . MVP candidate Draymond Green shot just 7 - of - 12 from the field en route to scoring 18 points . Up next , the Warriors will head home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Rockets will head home Wednesday to play the Suns .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) 101 - 97 on Saturday . Cleveland has won seven straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 5 - 1 . Monta Ellis led the way for the Pacers in the losing effort , posting 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , three assists and a steal in 34 minutes . Tristan Thompson ( 16 ) , Tristan Thompson ( 16 ) and Tristan Thompson ( 16 ) were the only other players to score in double figures , while Mo Williams ( 10 ) , Mo Jefferson ( five ) , and Timofey Mozgov ( nine ) all scored in double figures . As a team , Cleveland shot just 43 percent from the field , while holding the Pacers to 43 percent shooting . Indiana also held Indiana to just 43 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc . Paul George led all scorers with 32 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , but NIkola Thompson 's 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) . George Hill had 14 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds . The Pacers had six players finish in double figures for points . Tristan Thompson scored 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and added eight rebounds , two blocks and an assist , and Mo Williams finished with 10 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) and four rebounds off the bench . The Pacers had six players finish in double digits , including all five starters . Kevin Love led the way , scoring 22 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , along with 19 rebounds and three blocked shots . Monta Ellis chipped in 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , with three assists , one rebound and one steal as well in 40 minutes . Tristan Thompson had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and grabbed eight rebounds in 30 minutes . The only other player to score double digits for Indiana was Tristan Thompson , who had 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds in 30 minutes . The Pacers will now get a night off before taking on the Minnesota Timberwolves at home on Friday night .
The Houston Rockets notched their ninth straight win as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Toyota Center on Friday night . The Rockets made history in a couple of different ways in this contest , beginning with their nine - game win streak , which is their longest win streak in eight years . They also sank an NBA-record 24 three - pointers , while James Harden passed Hakeem Olajuwon , to become the Rockets ' all time triple - double leader , as he notched his second straight triple - double , for the fifteenth of his career . Harden finished with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon notched a season - high 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from deep , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) shot 24 - of - 61 from long distance and tallied 27 assists in the game . They moved to 10 - 2 at home and will head out to Minnesota to take - on the Timberwolves on Saturday , for their second game in as many nights . The Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) fell short on the second night of a back - to - back as they struggled shooting , going 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and only 55 percent from the foul line . Anthony Davis scored 19 points before he was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a leg contusion , and did not return . No player tallied more than 20 points for the Pelicans but five players scored in double figures , including Cheick Diallo who went 4 - of - 5 from the field , for 10 points , along with seven rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans fell to 3 - 10 on the road and will look to bounce back as they visit San Antonio on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 6 - 7 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 5 - 4 ) 94 - 91 Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Spurs 47 - 26 , to coast to a 15 - point victory on the road . The Kings were the superior shooters in this one , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Kings were also able to force the Spurs into 14 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins who went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 5 - for - 0 from the three - point line to finish with 25 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Danny Green , who came off the bench to score 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . He 's now combined for 37 points in the last two games , as he 's been a big reason the Spurs secured such a large victory on the boards . Kawhi Leonard also had a strong showing . He finished with 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and five rebounds , while Duncan had 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) and eight rebounds . With the vicotry , the Kings were able to snap a three - game losing streak and will look to keep it interesting .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 55 - 23 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 40 - 32 ) 97 - 90 on Wednesday . The Spurs came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Spurs team . The key for San Antonio was their shooting , as they shot 48 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range against a tough Grizzlies defense . The ball movement was huge as well , with San Antonio dishing out 26 assists to the Grizzlies 18 . Memphis had to play this game without Chandler Parsons and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Kawhi Leonard had to carry the load for Memphis , as he tallied 19 points , seven rebounds and four assists in the loss . Marc Gasol did all he could to keep the Grizzlies hanging around , as he accumulated 23 points , seven rebounds and six assists in the defeat . Marc Gasol was the only other starter with more than eight points , as he totaled 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists in the win . All five starters scored in double figures , with Mike Parker and Patty Mills leading the team with 15 points a piece . Pau Gasol got the start at center and totaled 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists , despite going 6 - for - 0 from the free - throw line . Tony Parker scored 13 of his own , while also snatching three steals in the victory . On deck for the Spurs is a matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 12 - 21 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 22 ) 111 - 104 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans really dominated all aspects of this game . To begin with , they were the superior shooters , going 53 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line compared to the Mavericks who went 49 percent from the floor and only 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans were also able to force the Mavericks into 10 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Anthony Davis had a strong showing . He went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding 16 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . Harrison Barnes was the other Pelican to reach double figures in points , recording 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Solomon Hill , who scored 16 points ( 2 - 5 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 31 minutes . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 30 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Clippers shot 48 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and only 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Clippers into 13 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Chris Bosh had a big game , as he went 13 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 22 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Paul Wade had a strong showing , finishing with 17 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , four rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 40 points , 10 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . Dwyane Wade did n't have the best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 17 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his Sixers debut , JJ Redick struggled in this one , going 6 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while adding two rebounds . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

Both teams came into this game with a lengthy lay - off and it was evident by their play . The two teams combined for just 76 points in the first half on 8 - for - 20 shooting and 26 percent from three - point range . The key for the Clippers was their defense , as they held the Heat to 37 percent shooting and forced them to commit 15 turnovers . The Clippers have been playing better recently , but this was an ugly performance . Justise Winslow was the player of the game , as he scored 19 points to go along with his 13 boards . Chris Paul flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 19 points , six rebounds and 18 assists . Miami will look to keep this momentum going on Saturday , when they take on the Chicago Bulls in their next game . Miami ( 11 - 14 ) had lost four - straight headed into this game , so to say this win was needed would be a drastic understatement . Goran Dragic was the player of the game , as he collected 24 points , six rebounds and five assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , dropping 15 points and 13 rebounds . Marreese Speights played well off the bench too , dropping 19 points and one rebound . Los Angeles will look to play better in their next game on Sunday against the Los Angeles Lakers .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 94 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 36 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 25 points and grabbing six rebounds of his own . With the pair accounting for over half of the Spurs ' points Tuesday night , no other San Antonio players managed to score in double figures , but six managed to score at least six points . For the Thunder , they were led by LaMarcus Aldridge 's 25 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , and NIkola Adams ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) . Steven Adams had a big night for the Thunder 's bigs . He shot 7 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 25 points , to go along with six rebounds in 28 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 20 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 10 - 4 FT ) , but he still finished with 15 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 21 points and nine assists . Domantas Sabonis was the only other Thunder ' player to reach double figures , scoring 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 8 - 1 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) 100 - 93 on Friday . Cleveland has won four straight games , and in their last three games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used LeBron James as the point guard . While James has always facilitated the offense , he has n't spent a lot of time at point guard , and using a 6 - 7 forward there is creating devastating matchup problems for the Cavaliers ' opponents . James scored 19 points Saturday and has averaged 35 points over the last three games . Channing Frye played 32 minutes in his second game back from an MCL sprain which forced him to miss most of the preseason . Shumpert finished with 20 points and three rebounds in 25 minutes . Charlotte has lost three straight , and in his last three games , they were playing without Derrick Favors , whom remains sidelined with a sprained ankle . Tristan Thompson has filled in as the starting center in Favors ' absence , and still finished with 4 points and 12 rebounds in 30 minutes . The Hornets have two days off before going on the road to play the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday . The Hornets ' next game is on the road Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers . The Hornets ' next game is at home Monday against the New York Knicks .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Saturday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 23 - 16 ) 88 - 79 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 39 , the Grizzlies came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Jazz 21 - 21 , which set up to an 16 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 39 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while committing only 4 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Grizzlies were led by Marc Gasol , who went 7 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the free throw line to finish with a game - high of 17 points , while also adding four rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 27 points and 13 rebounds on the season . Mike Conley was able to notch a double - double of his own with 15 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , two assists and a steal . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Kings woes continued as they fell short of grabbing their 10th win of the season and are now owners of a four game losing streak . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league .
