The Toronto Raptors defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 117 - 115 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers ( 41 - 19 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Sunday . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' backcourt mate DeMar DeRozan . The perennial All-Star tallied a game - high 50 points on 16 - of - 28 shooting , and provided an impressive 12 - of - 13 tally from the field . The All-Star guard was highly efficient with a remarkable 38 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . C.J . McCollum continued his strong start to the season with 24 points , five assists , one rebound and two steals . Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Norman Powell led the bench with 24 points , a rebound and five assists . Jonas Valanciunas contributed 17 points , 10 boards and one assist . Norman Powell led the bench with 10 points , six boards and one assist . C.J . Henderson led the second unit with 24 points , one rebound , five assists and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas totaled 17 points , 10 boards , one assist and one block . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Norman Powell mustered 10 points , six rebounds and one assist . Norman Powell led the bench with 10 points , six boards and one assist . Gerald Henderson was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , six boards and an assist . Henderson 's 38 points led the way for the Raptors , a total he complemented with five assists and three rebounds . CJ McCollum totaled 24 points , one rebound , five assists and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Norman Powell led the bench with 10 points , six rebounds and one assist . The Trail Blazers continue on their swing through the Deep South with a visit to the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday evening , while the Raptors remain home and await the Phoenix Suns on Friday evening .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Utah Jazz 100 - 86 Tuesday at Vivint Smart Home Arena . The Spurs ( 5 - 1 ) held a fairly comfortable lead for the majority of Monday 's contest until a fourth quarter surge from the Jazz ( 5 - 1 ) . With less than two minutes remaining , it became a monster effort for the Spurs who had control of the game in the first half . Kawhi Leonard was once again tremendous , as usual , scoring a game - high 29 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting from the field and dishing out four assists . LaMarcus Aldridge also scored 19 points of his own , while Rodney Hood added 18 points , six rebounds and two assists of his own . Pau Aldridge ended up leading the way with a double - double of 19 points and six rebounds in just 29 minutes , while LaMarcus Aldridge scored 19 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting to go along with six rebounds and two steals . George Hill led the way for Utah with 29 points , five rebounds , two assists and a steal on 7 - of - 12 shooting in 24 minutes off the bench . The only other Jazz player to score in double figures was Patty Mills , who had 14 points in 24 minutes off the bench , and Joe Johnson finished with 14 points in 24 minutes . As a team , the Jazz shot 45 percent from the field and only 42 percent from three - point range . Up next , the Spurs will look to keep things rolling in Miami on Thursday , while the Jazz will head to Denver on Wednesday to take on the Nuggets .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 15 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Thunder players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 41 percent from the field . Up next , the Thunder will stay home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Mavericks will look to get back on the right track in Milwaukee on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 125 - 124 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets finished the game on a 28 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Houston 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . The Rockets offense was on point , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from long distance . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Houston winning that battle , 35 - 32 . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 39 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Gary Harris was second on the team , as he accrued 24 points , seven rebounds and eight assists off the bench . Eric Gordon led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 18 points . Clint Capela was a huge spark off the bench , providing 14 points and four rebounds on 7 - of - 8 shooting . On deck for Houston is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Sunday . The Rockets ( 49 - 22 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to show how dangerous they can be . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 39 points , seven rebounds , 11 assists and four steals . Nikola Jokic finished second on the team , totaling 22 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists . Nikola Jokic amassed 22 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and two blocks .
The Chicago Bulls ( 29 - 16 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 30 - 14 ) 102 - 98 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 30 - 21 in the first quarter alone . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 45 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Mavericks into 12 turnovers , while committing only 21 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bulls were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding seven rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 67 points in the last three games . The only other Maverick to reach double figures in points was Taj Gibson , who scored 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds off the bench . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday . rest of the starters .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 35 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 33 - 30 ) 114 - 103 on Tuesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 29 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 59 percent from the field , while the Bucks went just 52 percent from the floor . The Bucks also out - rebounded the Bucks 34 - 25 , even furthering their advantage in this one . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Michael Carter-Williams . Antetokounmpo went 17 - for - 16 from the field and 7 - for - 7 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding five rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Khris Middleton was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , two assists and two steals . He 's had a strong couple of games in row , combining for 43 points and 10 assists over the last two . Eric Gordon really struggled with his shot in this one . He shot 6 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 13 points . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 7 - 4 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 6 - 6 ) 110 - 93 on Tuesday . Los Angeles stopped their two - game losing streak with the win . The Clippers used every available player they had in the blowout , and six of their players finished in double digits . Chris Paul had a great game , putting up 26 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) with 12 assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block in 33 minutes . DeAndre Jordan had a double - double with 12 points ( 6 - 6 FG ) and 11 rebounds , and JJ Redick and J.J. Redick each scored 14 and 14 points respectively . J.J. Redick ( 13 ) , and Mario Chalmers ( 13 ) rounded out the five Los Angeles players who scored in double figures . Up next , the Clippers will head home Wednesday to take on the Grizzlies , while the Heat will stay home and take on the red - hot Spurs on Friday . Meanwhile , the Heat will travel to Indiana to take on the Pacers in a matchup with big of - Western Conference leading to back - to - back . Miami will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday . For the Heat , it was a disappointing loss that they let slip away . Miami has two days off before hosting the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday . The Heat 's next game is on the road Monday against the Atlanta Hawks .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Orlando Magic , 107 - 96 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Celtics ( 41 - 30 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' replacement Kelly Olynyk and the surging Kelly Olynyk in showdown off the bench . Olynyk led the Magic in scoring with 22 points in just 21 minutes on the floor , while also posting two assists , five rebounds and two steals . Kelly Olynyk was another distant second on the Magic with 22 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon went for 13 points , eight boards and a steal . Marcus Nicholson was productive in a reserve role as well , generating 13 points , six boards and a steal . Isaiah Thomas paced the Magic with 28 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Kelly Olynyk was next with a bench - leading 22 points , which he supplemented with five boards , two assists and two steals . Evan Fournier registered 13 points , three boards , two assists and two steals . Amir Johnson posted 11 points , two rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Amir Sullinger posted a 11 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three blocks . Marcus Nicholson was productive as a reserve as well with 13 points , six rebounds , one assist , one block and one block . The Celtics head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Magic remain home to face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday evening .
The New York Knicks ( 3 - 8 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 2 - 7 ) 109 - 93 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in Denver . The Knicks were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Nuggets 31 - 35 to seal the victory on the road . The Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were also able to force the Nuggets into 17 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Carmelo Anthony had a big game as well . He went 10 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding nine rebounds and four steals . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 28 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . The only other Nuggets player to reach double figures in points was Ty Lawson , who recorded 18 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and nine assists in 40 minutes . Since joining the Nuggets at the trade deadline , he 's averaged 7 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists per game . Ty Lawson did his best to keep the Nuggets in this game , going 6 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while adding nine assists and seven steals . He had shot a combined 7 - for - 18 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Shane Larkin added 7 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and two assists . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 46 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets were able to force the Knicks into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Rockets were led by James Harden , who went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 7 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 36 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 25 points and 22 rebounds on the season . Carmelo Anthony was able to notch his first double - double of the season , as he finished with 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and 7 assists . It was his third double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds over that span of games . Coming off the bench , Donatas Motiejunas added 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and eight rebounds in 32 minutes . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Tuesday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 35 - 23 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 20 - 36 ) 107 - 96 at Sleep Train Arena on Wednesday . Kawhi Leonard was the high - point man for the Spurs , finishing with 17 points , to go along with seven rebounds and two assists on 5 - of - 8 shooting in 17 minutes . Rudy Gay and Rudy Gay each added 16 points of action , to go along with six rebounds and four assists on 6 - of - 15 shooting . Rudy Gay was efficient shooting the ball , converting just 4 - of - 13 from the field en route to scoring 12 points . The Kings shot 40 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Spurs host the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 8 ) on Monday , while the Kings host the Dallas Mavericks ( 12 - 36 ) on Tuesday . The Kings woes continued as they fell short of grabbing their 10th win of the season and are now owners of a four game losing streak . While they were able to improve upon their shot selection , the shots simply did not fall in their favor . Tiago Landry was the high scorer for the Kings with 12 points , but the Kings shot just 48 percent from the field as a unit . The Kings , who rebounded from a double - overtime loss at the hands of the Mavericks on Tuesday , shot 48 percent from the field and made 12 - of - 33 three - point attempts . Rudy Gay led the way in scoring with 16 points to go along with six rebounds . Next up , the Kings play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , while the Kings visit the Detroit Pistons on Friday .

The Bucks were also able to force the Bucks into 15 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way , going 10 - for - 16 from the field to score 33 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . George Hill did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 19 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his Sixers debut , Khris Middleton shot 2 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 9 points . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . George Hill did everything he could to keep the Bucks in this game . He went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 29 points . He was able to get to the free throw line seven times , converting on a perfect 11 - of - 7 . He 's played well since returning from the All-Star break , combining for 62 points in his last two games . The only other Buck in double - digit points was Khris Middleton , who finished with nine points ( 2 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the New York Knicks on Wednesday .

They heated up significantly from the field against the Hawks ( 22 - 17 ) , managing a 43 percent success rate from the floor and 37 percent from three - point range . They also elicited 12 turnovers from the Hawks , while holding Atlanta to respective 43 and 37 percent success rates from the floor and three - point range , respectively . Shooting was the glaring difference in the game , with the Heat hitting 53 percent of their shots , while Milwaukee went just 42 percent from the field . Milwaukee did most of their damage in the first half , as they led 53 - 33 , headed into the locker room . Miami will host the New York Knicks on Saturday for their next game .
The Chicago Bulls ( 14 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 17 - 6 ) 115 - 106 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 37 points and 35 points . The early - season rust seems to be breaking off , and if Rose can stay healthy , a great performance on Christmas Day could be on tap for Thursday 's game against the Lakers . Portland has lost four straight games , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Trail Blazers will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Bulls have the right guys to build a winning team around . Damian Lillard scored a game - high 35 points and also had six assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Pau Gasol has been a monster in January . He finished with 13 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and one block . Pau Gasol has been a monster in his absence . He recorded 13 points , 10 rebounds and four assists , but struggled with his shot and finished the game with 10 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Jimmy Butler led all scorers with 35 points , to go along with five rebounds and six assists . He struggled with his shot over his last two games , going scoreless on 3 - of - 11 shooting . His backcourt mate , Jimmy Butler , struggled , finishing with just 11 points on 4 - of - 11 shooting . Nicolas Batum , who returned to the lineup after missing the previous three games with an ankle injury , posted 10 points , four rebounds and five assists in 37 minutes . Both teams play the next game on Friday for the second game of a back - to - back , in Chicago .

In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate the two in the box score . The Miami Hawks ( 47 - 12 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 47 - 33 ) 93 - 91 on Sunday . The Hawks had a pleasantly surprising opening night offensive outburst , tallying 122 points and doing so on a poor shooting night from star Goran Schroder . Millsap led the way with a mammoth 22 - point , five - rebound double - double , which also included four assists and three steals . The performance was a glimpse of the significant potential the Hawks ' offense possesses , even with Bradley Beal out of the lineup . However , their inability to put together outings such as Saturday 's with any type of consistency has been at the root of their mediocre record over the first 34 games . Dwyane Wade led the way for the Heat with 22 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder was next with 16 points , four assists , a rebound and five steals . Henry Walker and John Jenkins followed with a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding two rebounds and an assist , and the latter pitching in with two rebounds , four assists , three steals and a block . Henry Walker was the only other starter with double - digit points , amassing 10 points , two rebounds and an assist . The Heat remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and are currently slotted in the fourth seed in the conference as well . They head to Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Tuesday .

This game was much closer than most people would have anticipated , as the Trail Blazers had their worst shooting night of the season . The still ended up prevailing with the victory despite shooting 8 - for - 38 from three - point range . The most notable stat line was a triple - double from Damian Lillard , as he accumulated 28 points , 10 assists and five rebounds in the victory . Brook Lopez also had a nice game in just 30 minutes of play , as he scored 21 points to go along with four boards . All five starters scored in double - figures , but they need more from their bench if they are to have any success this season . The Nets will look to bounce - back when they take on the Chicago Bulls on Sunday . The Trail Blazers and they may have had a huge win on the road , but they fell short in a must win . They were led by Brook Lopez , who tallied 21 points and four rebounds in the win . This is a scary team right now and the sky is the limit with the way they are currently playing . The Trail Blazers will play the second half of a back - to - back against the Phoenix Suns on Saturday . The New Orleans Pelicans ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 7 ) 109 - 102 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Pelicans were able to out - score the Lakers 34 - 24 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Los Angeles . The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 42 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Lakers were also able to force the Lakers into 30 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Anthony Davis and Tyreke Evans . Davis went 10 - for - 16 from the field to score 25 points , while also grabbing 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 46 points and 7 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 16 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Jrue Holiday was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 17 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) , five assists and one steal , while Jeremy Lin chipped in with 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists of his own . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Lakers will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Utah Heat ( 6 - 3 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 4 - 4 ) 92 - 91 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 38 , the Heat came out strong in the third quarter and out - scored the Jazz 59 - 67 to finish the second half and steal the victory on the road . The Heat were able to out - rebound the Jazz 47 - 42 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Heat were led by Alec Burks in this one . Burks scored 24 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , while also adding three rebounds , four assists and a steal , while Whiteside scored nine points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) and grabbing 14 rebounds . He also got to the free throw line 12 times , converting on a perfect 10 - of - 12 . He 's played well since returning from the All-Star break , combining for 59 points over his last two games . Goran Dragic continued his strong play , finishing with 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , three rebounds and four assists in 35 minutes . Considering he 's averaging only six points on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Heat . It was his fourth double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 15 points and 18 rebounds over that span of games . Coming off the bench , Tyler Johnson was the only other player in double figures , fininshing with 17 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt ) , four rebounds , three assists and two steals in 29 minutes . The only other Buck reaching double figures in points was Rodney Hood , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , three assists and two steals in 38 minutes . The Heat ' next game will be on the road against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 47 - 13 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 38 ) 101 - 98 on Sunday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Pelicans have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 32 percent from beyond the arc . He 's now recorded two double - doubles in the past five games , increasing his season total to seven . Holiday on the other hand shot 12 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from beyond the arc . He 's averaging 19 points and 18 rebounds on the season . Jrue Holiday was able to record a double - double of his own . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Orlando Magic , 111 - 92 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 23 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Orlando 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 54 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while Orlando went 43 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Hawks recorded more assists than the Magic , while committing less turnovers . The Hawks ( 19 - 16 ) are starting to rebound after a terrible December and dominant road wins like this show just how good they can be . Dennis Schroeder ran the offense at ease , accumulating 18 points , six rebounds and seven assists in the win . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 12 rebounds . Elfrid Payton tallied 15 points , four rebounds , six assists and three steals . Kent Bazemore was huge off the bench , providing 17 points and four steals . The Hawks will be in action again on Saturday against the Miami Heat .

Those struggles carried into the second quarter , and the team found themselves down by 10 at the half and they appeared ready to earn their fourth straight loss . A big second half , however , helped turn this around , and they managed to outscore the Pacers ( 34 - 33 ) by 16 in the second half en route to the victory . Carmelo Anthony led the way for New York , recording a double - double of 22 points and 13 rebounds in 41 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis struggled in the outing , shooting just 5 - of - 17 from the field en route to scoring 11 points , and to make matters worse , he left the game early in the fourth quarter and did not return due to a thigh bruise . As for Indiana , it was a forgettable shooting night for them in every aspect of the game . As a team , the Pacers shot just 37 percent from the field , 28 percent from behind the arc and 60 percent from the free throw line - - although they only attempted 15 shots at the charity stripe . The key for Utah was their shooting , as they shot 45 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range against a tough Grizzlies defense . While James has always facilitated the offense , he has n't spent a lot of time at point guard , and using a 6 - 10 forward there is creating devastating matchup problems for the Cavaliers ' opponents . The Indiana Pacers ( 28 - 22 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 23 - 28 ) 105 - 84 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers got out to an extremely quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 30 - 32 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Pacers also shot much better than the Pistons , going 48 percent from the field , while the Pistons went just 41 percent . The Pacers also out - rebounded the Pistons 41 - 43 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Pacers were led by Paul George , who went 9 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding three rebounds and a steal . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 6 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Marcus Morris shot 7 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . Jon Leuer was the only other player in double figures for the Pistons . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 43 percent from the floor and a meager 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers also forced the Bucks into 12 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own . Miles went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a season - high of 22 points . Considering he 's averaging 11 points on the year , it was a nice surprise for the Bucks to get some extra offensive production out of Miles . In fact , Miami pulled out the rare wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 25 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Heat shooting 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range . The Pacers could only muster up 40 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Miami winning that battle , 43 - 43 . The Heat also dominated the assist ratio , recording 15 more assists than Indiana , while committing five less turnovers . The Heat ( 30 - 29 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to disappoint playoff contenders . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 3 assists over those three games . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to Chicago .
The Phoenix Suns ( 27 - 20 ) beat the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 16 ) 106 - 98 on Friday . Washington found out before the game that starting shooting guard Bradley Beal will miss a minimum of two weeks with what is being termed as an initial - stage stress reaction in his lower right fibula . The development thrust Paul Pierce into the starting lineup in Beal 's stead , a situation that the six - year pro had played well in earlier this season . It also figured to add more offensive responsibility to Beal 's backcourt mate John Wall and small forward Markieff Morris . Gortat posted a 14 - point , 8 - rebound double - double , while John Wall also posted a double - double of his own with 13 points and seven assists . The Suns were also able to post a solid 46 percent success rate from the field overall , limiting the Wizards to just 42 percent shooting from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Wizards ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 44 percent shooting for the visitors . The Wizards were led by Isaiah Dragic 's 20 points , which he supplemented with two assists , three rebounds and a pair of steals . Morris followed with 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Kris Humphries and Bradley Beal were next with a pair of 12 - point efforts . The former added three rebounds and an assist , while the latter had an outstanding defensive game as well , contributing eight rebounds and a block . Paul Pierce rounded out the stat sheet with 11 points , four rebounds , an assist and a block . PJ Tucker paced the Wizards ' bench with 12 points , 10 rebounds , an assist and two steals . The Wizards are currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and a game back of the eighth - seeded Detroit Pistons . They head to Charlotte to take on the Hornets on Monday .

Philadelphia were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pacers , as they led by 12 after the first quarter and by 14 headed into halftime . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Indiana recorded eight more assists than the 76ers , while committing five less turnovers . Paul George was the player of the game , as he tallied 15 points , six rebounds and three assists on 4 - of - 16 shooting . George George finished second on the team , accruing 12 points , four rebounds and four assists . Myles Turner amassed 10 points , six rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Monta Ellis was a nice spark off the bench , providing 13 points , three rebounds and five assists . The Pacers ( 37 - 62 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Paul George did all he could for Philadelphia , as he led the team with 15 points , six rebounds and four assists . Ian Thompson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 15 points and six rebounds . Hollis Thompson was a huge spark off the bench , providing 15 points , six rebounds and two assists . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Cleveland Cavaliers .

The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 21 - 22 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 42 percent from the field , while the Knicks went just 44 percent . Bargnani had a very impressive game , going 10 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's had a very strong stretch of four games , where he 's averaging 39 points . Notching a double - double , Brandon Bass finished with 16 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and seven rebounds before fouling out . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points on Sunday . Coming off the bench , Shane Larkin added 14 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 1 FT ) and six assists . The Rockets ( 31 - 9 ) have been rightfully lauded for their considerable improvement this season , which has persisted even after the season - ending knee injury to star center Joel Embiid . Houston 's ongoing transformation to a winning team has not been as evident all season as it was Friday , when they thoroughly dominated a team that still has postseason aspirations in the Hornets ( 20 - 19 ) . Kemba Walker tallied 25 points , 10 assists , six rebounds and one steal . Williams posted a 13 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and one steal . The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 14 ) defeated the host Oklahoma City Thunder ( 40 - 30 ) 111 - 95 , on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena . This game appeared to be over from the start , as the Warriors raced out to a 25 - 22 lead after the first quarter and never looked back . Golden State continues to rewrite NBA history , becoming the first team to start a season with 17 consecutive victories . They are now just 10 wins away from tying the 1971 - 72 Lakers for the longest winning streak of all time at 34 games . For the Thunder , Klay Thompson finished with 34 points , six rebounds and two assists over 32 minutes . Russell Westbrook added 15 points of his own , while Victor Oladipo chipped in 17 points to go with six rebounds . Enes Kanter had 15 points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench . The Thunder were led by Klay Thompson , who scored a game - high 34 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting from the field . Russell Westbrook finished with a double - double of 15 points and 7 assists , while Victor Oladipo filled the stat sheet with 17 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Warriors shot 48 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Warriors host the Phoenix Suns ( 6 - 7 ) on Monday , while the Thunder host the Dallas Mavericks ( 10 - 17 ) on Tuesday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 7 - 7 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 6 ) 115 - 111 on Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . In a game of runs , the Thunder and Thunder found themselves locked up following the fourth quarter , but in overtime the Thunder were able to use a team - effort to outlast the Thunder and steal the four - point victory on the road . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 44 percent from the floor and 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also severely out - rebounded the Thunder 51 - 49 , but it still was n't enough to push them to the victory . What may have been the difference was free throws , as Russell Westbrook went just 13 - for - 34 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line . He was able to get to the line a wopping 5 times , but converted on only two of those attempts . He 's now averaging 31 points and 13 rebounds on the season . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 9 FT ) , but he still finished with 14 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 6 points , 7 assists and 10 rebounds . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Monta Ellis , who hadd 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

Their opponent , the Kings , despite their record , have been a formidable foe over their last seven games , winning won four - of - seven , as well as their last two in a row . Sacramento started out terribly slow , with a 20 - point first quarter , but managed to cut the deficit to one by half time . The teams matched each other in the third quarter , leaving the fourth to decide the game . Although their season comes to an end , the Warriors have plenty to look forward to with their solid young core . Buddy Hield led the Kings in scoring , with 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and seven assists , in 33 minutes , while Ty Lawson added 20 points ( 8 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , two assists and one rebound , in 24 minutes off the bench . Skal Labissiere continued his impressive play with 22 points on 7 - 14 shooting , along with eight rebounds , two steals and seven assists , in 33 minutes . No other player scored in double figures for the Kings , who struggled on both ends of the floor . The series now heads back to Sacramento for Game 4 on Sunday .

Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 16 - 12 ) up by two with just 12 seconds remaining . The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , who had had a balanced offensive attack in their previous game , were able to pull away in the fourth quarter . Russell finished the game with a game - high 46 points , seven rebounds and seven assists in 35 minutes , while Dennis Schroder added another 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , eight assists and five rebounds in just 40 minutes . Jerami Sefolosha added 15 points of his own , while Jerami Grant chipped in with 15 points in 28 minutes off the bench . As a team , the Thunder won the game at the 6 - point line , shooting a scorching 12 - of - 31 from behind the arc . For the Thunder , it was a slow start and a slow finish , but Russell Westbrook was able to carry the load for the Hawks . He finished with a game - high 46 points on 16 - of - 33 shooting from the field to go along with 11 rebounds and seven assists in 35 minutes . Their problems stemmed from their lack of bench production , however , as without Eric Gordon ( toe ) for the second straight game , the bench lacked its usual luster and produced just 38 total points . The loss is just a minor scratch on the Thunder ' season however , as the team has now put win streaks of nine and ten games together over the past month and remain just a half - game behind the Spurs for first place in the Southwest Division . Up next , the Hawks will look to extend their win streak to six against the Mavericks in Dallas on Saturday , while Thunder will head to Boston on Wednesday to take on the Celtics .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Harden’s ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , five boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Mavericks will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Rockets will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .

Minnesota will stay home to host the Washington Wizards on Saturday .
The Phoenix Warriors ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 0 - 3 ) 106 - 100 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . In a winning effort , the Suns finished the game shooting 42 percent from the field and 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns shot 41 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line . The Warriors were led by the duo of Stephen Curry and Stephen Curry . Curry went 9 - for - 17 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 28 points , while also dishing out six assists . He 's now averaging 26 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Eric Bledsoe did n't have his best game from the field , but he managed 21 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , five rebounds and six assists in 36 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 3 rebounds on the year . Both Tyson Chandler and Klay Thompson reached double figures in points as well . Chandler finished with 26 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds , while Thompson added 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 1 - 3 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 1 ) 94 - 82 on Friday . This was a mismatch on paper and that ended up being the case on Saturday . The Pacers dominated in nearly every category , as they recorded more rebounds , assists , blocks and steals than the Sixers . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 42 combined turnovers between the two teams . The key for Indiana was their defense , as they held the Pistons to 38 percent shooting and forced them to commit 15 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Indiana recording 21 assists to the Pistons 14 . The Pistons have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and Indiana is just what they needed to get going . Reggie Jackson had a good game though , as he tallied 20 points , six assists and two steals in the loss . No other player scored in double figures for the Pistons , as the other four starters combined for just 12 points . The bench was spectacular , as four players scored in double figures with Ersan Stuckey leading the team with 23 points . Ersan Ilyasova had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 12 points and four rebounds . The Pacers have a tough matchup in their next game , as they play the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 5 - 7 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 11 ) 94 - 92 Tuesday at the Barclays Center in Oklahoma City . The Thunder had a strong first half where they out - scored the Thunder 27 - 27 , to coast to a 11 - point victory on the road . The Nets were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 45 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Thunder into 18 turnovers , while only committing 18 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Jarrett Jack , who came off the bench to score 23 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Mirza Teletovic went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 13 points in 28 minutes . He 's averaging 28 points over his last three games , as he 's been on fire of late . Deron Williams also had a solid showing and finished with 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , four assists and a steal . He 's played well of late , averaging 14 points over his last five games . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 16 - 27 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 19 - 27 ) 116 - 99 on Saturday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pelicans got a much needed win to keep slim hopes alive for the playoffs . The Pelicans outscored the Bucks 32 - 25 in the fourth quarter for a comeback win . The turnovers were the difference in the game , as they committed 18 turnovers to the Bucks 18 . That marks the 10tth - straight game that the Bucks have been outrebounded , with nine of those being by at least 18 boards . Anthony Davis had one of his best games of the season , as he accumulated 22 points , seven rebounds and five assists in the loss . Greg Monroe also had a nice game off the bench , as he totaled 12 points , 6 rebounds and three blocks in the defeat . The bench was solid as well , with Norris Anderson , Ryan Anderson and Ryan Anderson combined for 55 of the Pelicans 99 points . The only other player to score double figures for the Bucks was Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he amassed 10 points , six rebounds and two assists . The bench was big for Milwaukee , as Giannis Anderson tallied 10 points , six rebounds and two assists in the defeat . The Bucks will look to get out of this rut on Friday in a much better matchup against the Orlando Magic . The Pelicans had a tough task here against a hot Pelicans team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Khris Middleton led the team in scoring , dropping 22 points on 8 - for - 16 shooting off the bench . Greg Monroe recorded a double - double , as he scored 22 points to go along with 11 boards .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 19 - 17 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 15 - 22 ) 91 - 78 on Wednesday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Portland , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Grizzlies really turned it on , as they outscored the Blazers 67 to 21 in the final 11 minutes . The key for the Grizzlies was their defense , as they held the Trail Blazers to 39 percent shooting and forced them to commit 21 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Memphis recording 21 assists to the Trail Blazers 14 . Portland came into this game as a huge favorite , but couldn’t muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 23 rebounds . Marc Gasol had one of his best games of the season , as he amassed 26 points and 18 rebounds in the loss . Courtney Lee also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . Portland has a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday in their next game . Memphis didn’t play their best game here , but they continued their winning ways . Damian Lillard was spectacular , as he tallied 17 points , seven assists and three rebounds in the win . Al-Farouq Aminu also played well in the victory , as he tallied 15 points , 14 rebounds and three blocks in the defeat . The Grizzlies will look to build off this win against the Phoenix Suns on Monday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 50 - 13 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 39 ) 114 - 104 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 15 - 37 in the first quarter alone . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 49 percent from the floor and a meager 37 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Spurs forced the Kings into 13 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own . The Spurs were led by the duo of Tyreke Evans and Tyreke Evans . Evans went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding four assists and two steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Ginobili on the other hand went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 19 points off the bench . It was only the second time this season he 's reached the 5 - point mark , as he 's now averaging 13 points on the year . Kosta Koufos was able to record a double - double , as he finished with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 14 points and 13 rebounds over that span . The only other Kings player to reach double figures in points was Danny Green , who came off the bench to score 14 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in 25 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 15 ) 104 - 79 on Saturday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 29 - 13 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 38 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , three assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 4 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 21 - for - 29 from the field and 4 - for - 18 from deep to score 29 points . Kevin Love chipped in with 10 points ( 2 - 5 FG , 5 - 8 FT ) and 13 rebounds . With the loss , the Magic 's next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Utah Jazz , 112 - 104 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Celtics ( 35 - 19 ) picked up their 40th win of the season and continue to rise in the Western Conference behind stellar play from Rudy Gobert . The elite center for Boston tipped in the buzzer beater for the win over the Kings on Wednesday , and came up with another ridiculous stat line on Wednesday , as he finished with 14 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal on 5 - of - 9 shooting in 34 minutes . George Hill and Gerald Green combined for 43 points off the bench , while Kelly Olynyk poured in 19 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting in 27 minutes off the bench . Kelly Olynyk looked good , leading the team with 19 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 8 - of - 11 shooting . Kelly Olynyk added 19 points and seven rebounds , while Marcus Smart chipped in 10 points on 7 - of - 8 shooting . All five starters scored in double figures , as Gerald Green led the way for the Jazz with 16 points on 7 - of - 8 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 59 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Jazz host the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday , while the Jazz visit the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 41 - 8 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 30 ) 110 - 97 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Spurs have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 60 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went 46 percent from the floor and just 16 percent from deep . The Spurs also out - rebounded the Pelicans 36 - 45 , even furthering their advantage in this one . The Spurs were led by the duo of LaMarcus Aldridge and Kawhi Leonard . Leonard went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding five rebounds and four steals . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Danny Green had arguably his best game of the season . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding seven rebounds in 39 minutes . It was the most minutes he 's seen yet this postseason and he made it count with a very strong performance . Green , on the other hand , added 26 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with five rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's had two impressive games in a row , combining for 34 points and 16 rebounds over that span . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Ryan Anderson , who recorded 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 31 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 106 - 99 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Pacers ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard Kyle Lowry in the offseason , inking the 17 - year old to a six - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 25 points and adding five rebounds , six assists and a pair of steals . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Pacers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Toronto actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 45 percent to 45 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Indiana with 25 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , six assists and three steals . C.J . Miles was next with 18 points , one assist , four rebounds and three steals . DeMarre Carroll supplied 14 points , eight boards , four assists and two steals . Ian Mahinmi supplied 10 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks in 25 minutes off the bench . Lowry was the only other member of the first unit to reach double digits in the scoring column , collecting nine points and adding four assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Pacers remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Saturday night .

The Thunder actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 50 boards to the Magic 's 50 . The Thunder also shot well from long distance , as they went 16 - for - 34 in their win . The Thunder have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Kevin Durant led the team with 37 points and also snatched down five rebounds , five assists , two steals and three blocks in the win . Tobias Harris also had a nice game off the bench , as he tallied 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Thunder have a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in their next game . Oklahoma City has been playing their best ball of the season recently , but this was a baffling loss . Nikola Vucevic recorded yet another double - double , as he amassed 16 points and 3 rebounds in the defeat . Mario Hezonja led the team with 16 points off the bench . Orlando will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday in their next scheduled game .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 104 - 96 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 16 - 6 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) , managing a 49 percent success rate from the floor and 30 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Clippers ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 30 percent shooting from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . Los Angeles ripped off 66 points over the second and third quarters while limiting their visitors to exactly half that total , spearheading their most lopsided victory of the season . Bradley Beal led the way for Washington with 29 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals . Blake Griffin was right behind with 14 points , two rebounds , three assists and one steal . J.J. Redick supplied 10 points , two rebounds and two assists . DeAndre Jordan had a near double - double with 11 points , eight boards , one steal and one block . Jamal Crawford paced the second unit with 12 points and three rebounds , while Jamal Crawford supplied 12 points in a reserve role as well . The Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) were led by Bradley Beal 's 29 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , four assists and three steals . Blake Griffin was right behind with 14 points , two rebounds , three assists and a steal . DeAndre Jordan posted a 11 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included one block . J.J. Redick contributed 10 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals in 27 minutes as a reserve as well . Blake Beal led the way for Washington with 29 points , three rebounds , four assists and three steals . Chris Paul had a near double - double with 10 points , 11 assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Kris Humphries led the bench with 11 points , eight boards , one assist , three steals and one block . Jamal Crawford paced the second unit with 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . The Clippers resume post - All - Star - break play in Philadelphia against the Sixers on Friday , February 24th , while the Clippers kick off the second half of their season on the same night at home against the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Utah Jazz ( 9 - 9 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 12 - 7 ) 122 - 122 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 47 , the Jazz came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Jazz 32 - 27 , to steal the 15 - point victory on the road . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 43 percent from the floor and just 41 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Paul George backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 48 points ( 15 - 27 FG , 8 - 11 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . George went on to score a game - high of 35 points , while Favors went 14 - for - 24 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from beyond the three - point line to finish with 35 points . He was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on seven of those attempts . The double - double was his sixth of the season , pushing his season averages to 34 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Trey Burke was the only other player to reach double figures in points , recording 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists in 34 minutes . He had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 21 percent ( 2 - 10 FG ) , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Jakarr Burke had a strong showing . In 34 minutes , he posted 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists as well . The Jazz 's next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 40 ) 109 - 90 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 22 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Grizzlies forced the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own . Continuing his dominance of late , Brook Lopez had a very impressive performance . He went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also chipping in with four rebounds , four assists and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 20 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 24 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Mike Conley was able to notch a double - double of his own with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , two assists and two steals . Despite suffering the loss , the Nets had six players reach double figures in points . Wayne Ellington led the way , going 6 - for - 8 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while Wayne Ellington scored 18 points off the bench . It was a season - high in points for Ellington , who 's only reached double figures in points one other time this season . Surprisingly , Mike Conley was dialed in with his shot , going 7 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while adding four rebounds and five assists as well . He had shot less than 43 percent in each of his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction Sunday . Zach Randolph also had a strong showing , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds . The only other Net in double figures was JaMychal Green , who posted 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 21 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 114 - 80 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but their thorough domination of the Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) was significantly helped by the ejection of Russell Westbrook for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes for arguing a referee 's call . However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only two reserves , Enes Kanter and Alex Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column . Westbrook led OKC in scoring despite the early exit , supplying 21 points to go along with five rebounds and two steals , although he notably did not record any assists . Kanter totaled 19 points and five rebounds , while Abrines managed 10 points and three boards . Steven Adams mustered only six points but did haul in 15 rebounds and added two assists and two blocks . However , Andre Roberson , Domantas Sabonis and Domantas Sabonis could only register two points apiece . The Grizzlies were paced by Marc Gasol , who compiled 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and five blocks . The next two highest point totals came from the bench , as Troy Daniels posted 22 points , along with three rebounds and two assists , and Zach Randolph went for 21 points , eight boards and two assists . JaMychal Green produced 17 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , and Andrew Harrison , drawing another start for Mike Conley , tallied 10 points . Chandler Parsons returned after taking off the last game for rest purposes and produced two points , three assists and two steals over 15 minutes . The Thunder return home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on New Year 's Eve , while the Grizzlies are at Sacramento on Saturday afternoon as well .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 29 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest nine points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . The Timberwolves were paced by Kemba Walker , who posted 22 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Kaminsky III got another start at power forward in place of Marvin Williams and tallied 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest nine points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 9 rebounds . Walker , on the other hand , finished with 15 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 1 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and five assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . Also , coming off the bench , Darrell Arthur chipped in with a double - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Will Barton , who scored 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in only 12 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Hornets will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Monday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 6 - 9 ) 102 - 84 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Jimmy Butler returned to the Bradley Center after missing the last two games with a hip injury . He had 14 points , six rebounds and two assists in 26 minutes .
