The Houston Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) took care of business against the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 38 ) on Thursday in a 133 - 102 win . The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from deep , as they shot 49 percent from the field , 50 percent from three - point range and 77 percent from the free - throw line . The Rockets also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 55 - 42 . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 40 points , six rebounds and 8 assists . Patrick Beverley finished second on the team , totaling 18 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Tyler Ulis provided 13 points and six assists of his own off the bench . On deck for Houston is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday . The Suns ( 17 - 38 ) came into this fixture in the midst of a two - game losing streak , so a matchup against the Suns is just what the doctor ordered . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Patrick Booker was second on the team , with his 18 points and four boards . Alex Len recorded a double - double , amassing 13 points and nine rebounds . Sam Dekker and Leandro Barbosa each scored 12 points a piece .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 11 - 51 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 36 - 28 ) 122 - 109 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Memphis . The Nets got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Nets did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 40 percent compared to the Grizzlies , who went 40 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Nets did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Grizzlies into 15 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Sean Kilpatrick led the way for the Grizzlies , as he went 3 - for - 6 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 23 points , while also adding five rebounds and three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 24 points and 15 rebounds on the year . Mike Lin was able to contribute a double - double of his own with 18 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 4 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 28 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Coming off the bench , Randy Foye shot 5 - for - 7 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 16 minutes . It was his second straight night with 14 points , as he 's gone a combined 12 - for - 23 from the field over his last two games . He 's now averaging 23 points and 3 rebounds on the season . Whitehead on the other hand went 5 - for - 8 from the floor and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Philadelphia to play the 76ers on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 137 - 101 Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena . It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . The Suns ' backcourt was efficient and dominant offensively in the victory , with Eric Bledsoe leading the way with a triple - double of 25 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds . Devin Booker added 23 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc . In the end , all 13 Phoenix players managed to score against a struggling Lakers ( 19 - 39 ) defense . Those Lakers have now dropped two games in a row and three of their last four following Wednesday 's embarrassing defeat that ended with the team shooting just 38 percent from the field . Lou Williams was one of the lone bright spots for Los Angeles , as he increased his trade value yet again with 21 points off the bench on 7 - of - 13 shooting from the field . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . With the loss , the Lakers sit just a half - game behind the Suns for the worst record in the West but remain nine games behind the Nets for the worst record in the NBA . The teams will now both head into the All-Star break , with both resuming play on Friday , Feb. 24 .
The Boston Celtics ( 21 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 13 - 28 ) 117 - 103 on Monday at the TD Garden in Phoenix . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 36 - 29 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 39 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Isaiah Thomas backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with five assists and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 10 rebounds . Thomas came one assist shy of a double - double , as he posted 17 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , seven rebounds and three assists . While he did n't reach his season average of 18 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Amir Johnson , who had 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) and three assists . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . Even though Miami trailed by 13 at times in the first quarter , they rallied to pull out a much needed win . The third and fourth quarters is when Miami did their damage , as they outscored Los Angeles . 62 - 47 in that stretch . The Heat 's offense was efficient as ever , as they shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding and assists were lopsided as well , as Miami won the rebounding , 47 - 40 and the assist differential , 25 - 18 . The Heat 's first lead did not come until there was a minute left in the third quarter . Los Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) is in their worst stretch of the season right now and they continue to falter against bad teams . Lou Williams was once again the best player for the Lakers , as he dropped 27 points off the bench . Nick Young led the starters in scoring , as he scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . D'Angelo Russell had his bets game in weeks , accumulating 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . Miami ( 10 - 20 ) have been playing better than results would show , so a win here is just what the doctor ordered . D'Angelo Russell was the only other Laker in double figures , accruing 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Tyler Johnson led the bench in scoring , dropping 14 points to go along with six assists .

The Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Pacers ( 15 - 18 ) , managing a 49 percent success rate from the floor and 39 percent from three - point range . Washington was paced by John Wall , who supplied 19 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Jeff Teague followed with 19 points , 11 assists , two rebounds and a steal . The Los Angeles Clippers ( 10 - 1 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 6 ) 127 - 95 on Saturday . LA has won three straight games , and in their last three games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used Chris Paul as the point guard . While Paul has always facilitated the offense , he has n't spent a lot of time at point guard , and using a 5 - 11 forward there is creating devastating matchup problems for the Clippers ' opponents . Griffin scored 20 points on 9 - for - 15 shooting to go along with six rebounds and three blocks in 26 minutes . Jordan Griffin scored 14 of his 20 points in the fourth quarter , and added six rebounds , six assists and two steals to round out the box score , while Bogdan Bogdanovich pitched in 13 points on 46 percent shooting . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson’s return to the Nets lineup has been a big boost in team morale , as the rookie was a plus - minus all - star amongst his rookie class before his ankle injury . Jefferson was efficient off the bench , where he logged 22 minutes and finished with seven points , 14 rebounds and one block . The Nets have two days off before hosting the Milwuakee Bucks on Wednesday . By Wednesday 's game , the Nets expect to have Thaddeus Young ( personal ) and Paul Pierce ( knee ) in this one .

Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own , finishing with 25 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five assists . He had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 16 percent ( 1 - 13 FG ) , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Gerald Henderson added 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) and six rebounds off the bench , while Gerald Henderson chipped in 13 points . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 19 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 8 - 8 ) 106 - 103 on Tuesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Right from the tip - off , the Warriors were clearly the better offensive team in this one . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . They shot 49 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz shot 45 percent from the floor and only 32 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Jazz 35 - 35 , the Jazz were forced into 15 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry went a ridiculous 9 - for - 20 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 26 points , to go along with five rebounds and five assists . Chipping in off the bench , Rodney Hood was the only other player who could n't reach double figures in points , as he finished with 12 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Jazz will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 32 - 33 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 42 - 21 ) 106 - 101 on Sunday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Oakland . The Pistons got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 22 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Cavaliers 21 - 21 , but the Cavaliers were able to steal the victory and secure a seven - point victory on the road in Cleveland . The Pistons were able to out - rebound the Cavaliers 45 - 42 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The bench was led by Reggie Jackson with 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five assists and two blocked shots . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 7 - for - 29 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from deep to score nine points . Andre Thompson did n't have his best game offensively , but still finished with 15 points ( 5 - 18 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , while also adding nine rebounds and two blocked shots . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday as well . Game 42 will be the second night of a back - to - back for both teams .
Many have tossed around the term `` unicorn '' to describe Los Angeles forward Giannis Antetokounmpo , and on Wednesday , he made it obvious why . The 20 - year - old athletic marvel scored a team - high 41 points to go along with 14 rebounds , six assists , three steals , a block , and most impressively , zero turnovers . Antetokounmpo shot an efficient 11 - of - 20 from the field and went to the free - throw line ten times . Moreover , he was the cornerstone of an excellent offensive night for the Lakers as a whole . The surging team shot over 54 percent from the field and a stellar 11 - of - 34 from three - point range . Los Angeles also recorded 25 assists on the night , relying heavily on transition offense and ISO ball to lead to scoring . On the defensive end , the team was able to limit scoring on the interior fairly effectively . This was largely due to strong play from All-Star center Julius Randle , who had 15 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . The Lakers shot the lights out , hitting 52 percent of its shots from the field and 48 percent of their three - pointers . Khris Middleton , meanwhile , scored 14 points to go along with five rebounds and five assists . Third-year point guard D'Angelo Russell had one of his best games of the season , scoring 14 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting along with five assists . The Bucks will visit Denver on Wednesday , while the Lakers will host the Hornets on Sunday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 34 - 38 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 28 - 44 ) 112 - 100 on Sunday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 24 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 14 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 20 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Timberwolves on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 21 points paced the Timberwolves , and he added four rebounds , four assists and a pair of steals . Andrew Wiggins followed with 20 points , two steals , two assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio followed with 16 points , four assists , four rebounds and a steal . Jusuf Dieng contributed a 14 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and a block . Gorgui Dieng contributed 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists , four steals and two blocks . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday night . McCollum added four rebounds and four assists to his team - high scoring total . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday night .
The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 20 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 13 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 18 points , six rebounds and a steal . Rodney Hood was next with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Derrick Favors had a near double - double with 13 points and six rebounds , while Rudy Gobert filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal . Joe Johnson led the second unit with 10 points , two assists , two rebounds and two steals . Joe Johnson was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , two assists , two rebounds and two steals . Kristaps Porzingis led the Knicks with 28 points , eight rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a block . Derrick Rose registered 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Rudy Gobert turned in a 13 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , three blocks and a steal . Courtney Lee celebrated a return to the starting lineup with 10 points , six boards and a block . Joakim Noah went scoreless over 20 minutes but did haul in five boards , dish out two assists and haul in a block . The Knicks visit the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Knicks visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening as well .

The Pistons had a very strong first half Wednesday , out - scoring the Pistons 37 - 30 to seal the victory in front of their home crowd . The Warriors used their superior shooting to help out the Pistons , going 56 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 49 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . Durant did everything he could to keep the Pistons in this game , going 10 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while adding six rebounds and nine assists as well . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points in the last three games . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the New York Knicks on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 107 , at Barclays Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 7 - 20 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Lopez , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Nets ( 7 - 19 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Embiid tally 33 points , nine rebounds , an assist , three steals and three blocks . It was the first time since Feb. 35 that he failed to record a double - double , and it was the first time since Jan. 22 where he failed to record at least three rebounds . For the Nets ( 7 - 19 ) , they were once again led by Joel Embiid 's 33 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , an assist , four blocks and a steal . He was right behind him with a 30 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two steals and three blocks . The other four members of the first unit contributed full but modest stat lines . Jahlil Okafor compiled 15 points , five rebounds , two assists and a block . Jahlil Okafor continued his recent stretch of solid play off the bench , submitting a point - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , a steal and a block . Gerald Henderson paced the reserves with 10 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Wednesday . Embiid spearheaded the way for the first unit with 33 points , nine rebounds , eight assists , four blocks and a steal . Bojan Bogdanovic followed with 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Robert Covington contributed 15 points , five rebounds , two assists and a steal . Jeremy Lin filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , four assists , two rebounds and a pair of steals . Jahlil Okafor was productive as a reserve as well with three points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . The two teams meet again on Saturday night in Philadelphia for the second game of the home - and - home series .

These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Dallas took a six - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Mavericks , 46 - 26 . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 108 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Hornets ( 27 - 26 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Hornets ( 27 - 26 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Charlotte forced the Bulls to just 65 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . All five members of Charlotte 's first unit shot 43 percent or better , and four of them posted double digits in the scoring column . The Hornets also shot 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while seeing six players hit double digits in the scoring column . The T-Wolves were actually paced by Pau Gasol , who managed 20 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists , two blocks and a steal . Doug McDermott was next with 14 points , three assists and three rebounds . Taj Gibson contributed 11 points , seven rebounds and one block . Taj Zeller turned in a 11 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks and one steal . Doug Hawes led the bench with 14 points , three rebounds and one assist . Doug McDermott was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points , three rebounds and one steal . Nicolas Batum 's 30 - point , 8 - assist double - double that also included 13 rebounds , two steals and two blocks , and Michael Kidd-Gilchrist matched Gasol 's scoring total , adding seven rebounds and a block . Spencer Hawes led the bench with 13 points , eight rebounds and one assist . Jeremy Hinrich was productive as a reserve as well with eight points , two rebounds , five assists and a steal . Walker 's 30 points led the way for the Hornets , a total he complemented with eight rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Nicolas Batum pitched in with 19 points , eight boards , eight assists and two steals . E'Twaun Moore and Taj Gibson turned in matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds and one block and the latter registering eight boards and one block . The Bulls head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Bulls remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .

George Hill added 18 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , two rebounds , three assists and one block , in 32 minutes , while Jamal Crawford chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Jazz will begin a three - game road trip , which includes two visits to the Moda Center in LA , with a match in Golden State on Sunday . The Clippers will be right back in action with a game in Los Angeles on Sunday . The Jazz will be facing the second night of a back - to - back , as they visit Houston on Monday , in what will be the second game of a four - game road trip . The Clippers will visit the winner of the second game on Monday , as they will look to build off this win .
The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 101 - 93 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 30 - 24 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' replacement Paul George and the surging Paul George to start the game . George was right behind him with a season - high 31 points , which he supplemented with 11 rebounds , four assists and three steals . The game included an 7 - for - 7 tally from three - point range , including 5 - for - 7 from beyond the arc . Hassan Whiteside followed with a 19 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two blocks and a steal . Josh McRoberts provided a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Ian Mahinmi was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points , six rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . The Heat was paced by Goran Dragic , who supplied 24 points , five assists and eight rebounds . Backcourt mate Dwyane Wade was next with 16 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Luol Deng was next with 13 points , seven rebounds , an assist and four steals . Ian Mahinmi managed 11 points , six rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . George Hill was right behind with 16 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Joe Young led the second unit with 10 points , three assists and a pair of rebounds , while Joe Young went for 10 points , two rebounds and three assists . Joe Young paced the Pacers with 10 points , two rebounds and three assists . Miami remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday night .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 4 - of - 9 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards ( 28 - 13 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 17 - 24 ) 99 - 90 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 23 - 26 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Wizards also shot much better than the Nets , going 52 percent from the field , 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went just 44 percent from the floor and 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Nets into 10 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Wizards ' frontcourt was a huge factor in the win . Nene finished with 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 8 FT ) and six rebounds , while Johnson had 15 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three assists . Jack was able to get to the line 6 times , and converted on a perfect 2 - of - 2 . He on the other hand had 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds and three blocked shots . Lopez has been on an absolute tear of late , posting four double - doubles in a row , while averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds over that span . He 's averaging 12 points and 6 rebounds on the season . John Wall did n't have his best shooting performance , but he went just 5 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line , but he still finished with a team - high of 11 points . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 39 - 7 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 23 ) 130 - 99 on Sunday at the Toyota Center in San Antonio . The Spurs came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Rockets 35 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters , going 56 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were also able to force the Rockets into 15 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who posted his fourth double - double of the season . He finished with 25 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds , giving the Blazers the spark needed to secure the win . James Harden did everything he could to keep the Rockets in this game , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points . He also got to the free throw line nine times , converting on nine of those attempts . He 's now averaging 18 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Tony Parker was able to record 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists as well . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Rockets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

He 's surely been missed out on the court , as the Bucks are 4 - 0 without Durant , losing back - to - back games to the Celtics and Grizzlies before tonight 's win . The Nets got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Pacers did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 39 percent compared to the Nets , who went 39 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Pacers did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Nets into 19 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Paul George led the way with a team - high of 24 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 14 rebounds per game . The Miami Heat ( 7 - 12 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 11 - 9 ) 111 - 110 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 55 , the Jazz came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Jazz 31 - 29 , but the Jazz were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Heat were able to out - rebound the Jazz 40 - 31 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Heat were led by James Hayward , who went 12 - for - 22 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 32 points , while also adding seven assists and two steals . He shot a combined 11 - for - 37 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Joe Ingles went 6 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while also adding four assists . He shot a combined 6 - for - 10 from the field over his previous two games , so it was good to see him get dialed back in and have a strong showing . Goran Dragic also had a productive night offensively , scoring 27 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) and handing out six assists . He 's now averaging 6 points , 2 rebounds and 5 assists on the year . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Josh McRoberts , who recorded 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and five rebounds . The Heat ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 110 - 106 , at TD Garden on Friday . Facing a Sixers ( 9 - 25 ) squad that had only tallied three road wins in 13 tries coming in , it may have been hard to blame the Celtics ( 22 - 25 ) if they were guilty of a little overconfidence Friday . A 39 - point second period by Philadelphia was therefore likely a rather sobering wake - up call , as was the 62 - 51 halftime deficit Boston found itself in . The Celtics were mostly a different team in the second half , as they outscored their visitors by a 59 - 44 margin over the final 26 minutes . However , they came out strong in the third quarter , outscoring the visitors by a 57 - 48 margin over the third and fourth quarters . However , the Celtics ( 9 - 25 ) outscored their hosts by a 32 - 26 margin in the final period , leading to their 12th straight victory . The Sixers were led by Ersan Ilyasova , who tallied 20 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Al Horford generated a 19 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two blocks . Marcus Smart was productive in a reserve role as well , generating a typically full stat line of 14 points , two rebounds , eight assists , two blocks and one steal . Ersan Ilyasova paced the Sixers with 20 points , two rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Ersan Ilyasova went for 20 points , two assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Nerlens Noel supplied a 13 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three steals and three blocks . Amir Johnson made the start for Al Horford ( groin ) and contributed 13 points , five rebounds , three assists , four blocks and three steals . The Sixers head back home to tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Monday night , while the Celtics remain home and await the Toronto Raptors for a Friday night showdown .
The Chicago Bulls ( 34 - 38 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 34 - 38 ) 117 - 95 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Despite securing the victory , the Cavliers were out - shot in this matchup . The Pistons went 59 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 44 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Pistons into 15 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bulls were led by Nikola Mirotic , who went 12 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding five rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 11 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Butler came one assist shy of a double - double , as he posted 16 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists . While he did n't reach his season average of 30 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Jon Harris , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and six rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 9 - 56 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 18 - 47 ) 95 - 89 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Sixers did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 32 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 29 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the 76ers did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Nets into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Brook Lopez had a monster game . He went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also chipping in with seven rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 47 points and 13 rebounds . Nerlens Noel was able to notch his fourth double - double of the season , as he finished with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 11 rebounds . He 's combined for 0 - of - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 10 from the three - point line over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction Sunday . Nerlens Noel was able to record a double - double of his own , as he finished with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 11 rebounds . The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .

The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 33 percent compared to the Knicks , who went 33 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Knicks into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Vucevic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 12 - of - 20 from the field to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding 18 rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 11 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , but he still finished with 19 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 43 points , six rebounds and five assists . Rookie Elfrid Payton nearly notched a triple - double , as he recorded 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 20 points , 13 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . Willie Green had a big game off the bench with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and two steals in 36 minutes . Jason Smith and Willie Green were the only other Knicks to reach double - digit points as well , with 13 and 13 points respectively . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 108 - 101 , in Game 10 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at American Airlines Arena . A close series ended in a manner that was anything but , as Miami walloped Charlotte 18 - 22 in the first quarter and only continued the onslaught from there . Though the Heat remain without superstar forward Chris Bosh , the veteran team played some of its best basketball of the season in Sunday 's blowout . Point guard Goran Dragic found his stride , scoring a game - high 33 points on impressive 8 - for - 16 shooting . Defensive Player of the Year second - runner - up Hassan Whiteside , meanwhile , showcased his impressive block timing by swatting five shots . It was an all - out dismantling on Sunday , with the Heat out - rebounding their opponents 46 - 39 and shooting an impressive 44 percent from the field and 71 percent from beyond the arc . The Hornets , meanwhile , saw strong play from their own star . Point guard Goran Dragic led the team with 22 points , also tacking on five assists en route to the victory . Sophomore center Marvin Williams also impressed , scoring 14 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting . The Hornets were able to close out the game on the glass , out - rebounding Charlotte 39 - 39 . The Hornets have been sitting a league - best record for the first time this season , and came into Friday 's matchup on the road against Atlanta . Guard Dion Waiters also struggled to find his shot , going 2 - for - 9 from the field , but still managed to contribute 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , and four steals . Both teams will be at home on Saturday , with the Hornets taking on the Utah Jazz and the Hornets host the Toronto Raptors .
The Utah Jazz ( 20 - 34 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 36 - 18 ) 92 - 76 on Monday . The Jazz came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Jazz team . The key for Utah was their shooting , as they shot 45 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding battle , winning that battle , 48 - 37 . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Jazz , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 50 - plus minutes . Portland 's offense was dominant , as they held the Trail Blazers to 36 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Jazz recorded 18 assists and eight turnovers , while the Jazz committed 13 turnovers to their 12 assists . The Jazz ( 20 - 34 ) had to play this game without Isaiah Thomas and it really hurt them late when they needed a clutch basket . LaMarcus Aldridge did all he could to keep the Trail Blazers hanging around , as he scored a team - high 19 points on 5 - of - 15 shooting . Damian Lillard was second on the team , as he accumulated 19 points , four rebounds and three assists . Nicolas Matthews was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 13 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Utah will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Brooklyn Nets .

Rudy Gay and DeMarcus Cousins carried the load , as they both scored 31 points and snatched down five rebounds a piece . The Dallas Hawks defeated the Dallas Mavericks 105 - 102 Monday at American Airlines Center . The Hawks ( 20 - 7 ) held a comfortable seven - point lead heading into halftime before allowing superstar Rajon Rondo and the Mavericks to come storming back and make it a competitive ball game . In the final minute of the game , Dennis Schroder was a difference maker on the defensive end , scoring all five of his points in the final period and scoring 10 of his 15 points in the final period . With the game tied at 108 after Dallas ' Kyle Schroder made a jumper with :2 left to put the game at bay in the fourth . In the end , it was a sequence that included a go - ahead three - pointer , a block on a Rajon Rondo layup with just two seconds left . The Mavericks ( 20 - 9 ) , on the other hand , made it a one - point game , but it was all downhill from there . While the Hawks would make a run in the fourth , Dennis Schroder was the difference maker for the Hawks , scoring a game - high 22 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting from the field . His running mate in the backcourt , Rajon Rondo , had an off night , going 6 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 13 points , and adding 11 assists and four rebounds in 33 minutes . Rajon Rando put together a nice stat line , recording a double - double with 13 points and 11 assists , along with four rebounds and three steals , in 33 minutes . Dallas shot 43 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Hawks host the Bulls on Monday , while the Mavericks visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday .

The Clippers were able to exploit the Hornets defensive breakdowns which eventually led to a 20 points blowout win . The Hornets shot a poor 48 percent from the field . The Clippers had trouble handling the ball as they gave up seven turnovers in the first quarter alone and a total of 16 turnovers .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 41 - 9 ) passed one of the toughest tests they 've gotten during their remarkable 18 - game winning streak , fending off the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 19 ) 105 - 96 Friday at the Philips Arena . When it appeared that Washington was storming back , Atlanta got a huge contribution from an unlikely source . Up by just one point with momentum swinging in Washington 's direction , Dennis Schroder buried a clutch three pointer to give Atlanta the lead to tie the game with just six seconds remaining . From there , the Hawks were able to salt the game away at the line , as DeMarre Carroll hit a three with two seconds left to seal the one - point win . Paul finished with 24 points , seven rebounds and nine assists on 9 - of - 19 shooting . Al Horford scored a team - high 21 points on 10 - of - 24 shooting to go along with 2 rebounds and two assists in 29 minutes . The Wizards , who shot 44 percent from the floor , were led by 24 points from John Wall . He also added nine rebounds and nine assists , while Horford added 21 points , 13 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 34 minutes . The Wizards shot 48 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 99 - 88 Tuesday at Smoothie King Center . The 76ers ( 5 - 18 ) used a dominant second half to pull away from the Pelicans ( 7 - 16 ) and end their eight - game winning streak . Philadelphia was once again led by Ersan Ilyasova , who scored a team - high 23 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists . Point guard Sergio Rodriguez had 16 points and eight assists , while Joel Embiid , who played after having two of the last three games off , scored 15 points and grabbed seven rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 12 points , six rebounds and four assists . Dante Exum was a nice spark off the bench , dropping 10 points in 27 minutes . On deck for Utah is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 5 - 8 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 12 tries . Gordon Hayward led the way for Utah , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 12 points , six rebounds and four assists . Wilson Chandler led the bench in scoring , dropping 17 points .
The Miami Heat ( 34 - 39 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 28 - 45 ) 109 - 102 on Friday . Reggie Jackson was a lightening rod off the bench for the Heat . He had 31 points to go along with nine rebounds and nine assists in 36 minutes . He was coming off a back - to - back 35 - point performance against the Bulls on Wednesday . In his second game back from injury , he finished with nine points , four assists , four rebounds and two steals . The Heat are trying to fend off the San Antonio Spurs , Portland Trail Blazers , Los Angeles Clippers , and Houston Rockets for the second seed in the Eastern Conference . The Nets , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference , one game ahead of the eighth and final playoff spot . The Pistons are currently tied with the Nets for the eighth and final playoff spot in the East , but the Trail Blazers have crept within three games of the spot . On the other hand , the loss of the Eastern Conference begins to grow , a positive sign as he has averaged 24 points and 3 assists while shooting 28 percent from the field and 13 from the three - point line . Drummond has been one of the top bright spots in the Pistons this season , as he 's averaging 20 points and 13 rebounds in April . However the Pistons are 11 - 1 this month and have been eliminated from playoff competition . The Pistons will take on the Charlotte Hornets , as Miami will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 10 - 2 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 6 - 7 ) 104 - 81 on Friday . Cleveland has won two straight games . They were paced by Kyrie Irving , who scored a game - high 25 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting in 29 minutes . Kevin Love recorded a double - double in 27 minutes of play , putting up 8 points on a game - high 12 assists and Tristan Thompson posted eight points and two rebounds in 27 minutes . The loss brings the Pistons into a tie with the Chicago Bulls for the final playoff spot in the East , but they currently sit just one game ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home Wednesday to take on the Grizzlies , while the Pistons will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Cleveland Cavaliers . Detroit was missing Kevin Love , who sat out Friday 's game with a knee injury . Starting at point guard , Ish Smith had four points and six assists in 23 minutes . Andre Liggins ( concussion ) returned to the starting lineup after missing the previous two games with a stomach flu . Jon Leuer continued his impressive play as he scored 15 points in just 22 minutes . The Cavaliers will play their second game of a back - to - back on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 52 ) on Tuesday , while the Pistons will play the Phoenix Suns on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 137 - 112 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday evening . The Bucks turned in their highest point total of the season , as they ran past the struggling Suns . The Bucks ( 22 - 28 ) shot a blistering 63 percent from the field , as they scorched the Suns ' defense . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 30 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and four blocks to stuff the stat sheet . Mirza Teletovic followed up with 19 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , to burn his former team . Jabari Parker added 18 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , and nine rebounds , as he was solid in 31 minutes . The Bucks are still stuck outside the top eight in the East but will look to continue to claw their way back , as they play host to the Heat on Wednesday . The Suns ( 16 - 35 ) shot only 42 percent from the field , and were dominated in the paint , where they were outscored 74 - 42 . However , Phoenix saw some great performances from some of it 's youngsters , as Marquese Chriss tallied a career - high 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , in only 24 minutes . Devin Booker went off for 27 points in the second quarter alone , but cooled down , as he finished with 31 points in the contest . Tyson Chandler grabbed 13 rebounds , while Eric Bledsoe and P.J . Tucker chipped in 13 points each . The Suns remain last place in the West but will continue to fight , as they go on to visit New Orleans on Monday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 25 - 17 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 16 - 24 ) 122 - 118 on Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 28 - 23 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 46 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Kings were also able to force the Kings into 22 turnovers , while committing only 19 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Thunder were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who went 8 - for - 20 from the field and 14 - for - 17 from the free throw line to finish with a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 18 rebounds on the season . Darren Collison also had a solid all - around game . He went 7 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding two assists . He 's now averaging 10 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Darren Collison went 7 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 21 points . He 's now combined for 37 points , five rebounds and five assists in the past two games . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

The length of the Cavaliers ( 32 - 15 ) caused some issues early on for the Cavaliers ( 32 - 15 ) in the first half , but Dallas took control in the second half . In the end , it was a sequence that included a go - ahead three - pointer , a block on a LeBron James layup and the win . The Mavs did not take their lead , however , and the Mavericks ( 18 - 15 ) were able to rally behind their starters and retake the lead midway through the third quarter after LeBron James and LeBron James were able to seal the win . James finished with 23 points , nine rebounds and nine assists , while Wesley Matthews added 21 points of his own . Harrison Barnes and Seth Curry each added 16 points , while Channing Frye finished with 13 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting . The Cavs were led by LeBron James , who put up 23 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and two steals , in 37 minutes . Cleveland shot 47 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Golden State Warriors ( 40 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) 144 - 98 on Wednesday . The Warriors continued to pursue perfection on their home court and keep the NBA record for most wins in the regular season alive and well after holding off the Clippers . A series of strong runs to end each of the second , third and fourth quarters made up for a motivated LA team . The Warriors got off to a torrid start , shooting an outstanding 62 percent from the field and limiting the Clippers to a 44 percent success rate from the field . The Clippers were led by Kevin Durant 's 23 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , seven assists , a steal and a block . He was right behind him with a 20 - point , 4 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and a steal . Blake Griffin was next with 20 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal . J.J. Redick pitched in with 13 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Clippers are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Wednesday . Golden State was led by a pair of 16 - point efforts from their backcourt duo of Klay Thompson and Klay Griffin . The former added four rebounds and two assists , while the latter supplied four rebounds , an assist and a steal . Klay Thompson was next with 16 points , which he complemented with one rebound , an assist and a steal . Austin Redick was next with a bench - leading 10 points , which he supplemented with a rebound . Raymond Felton registered 10 points , seven rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . The Clippers remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday night .

Especially Philadelphia , as they shot 35 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The three - point shooting was a huge differ as well , with Washington going 9 - for - 21 , while Philadelphia went just 3 - for - 25 . The Wizards also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to Philadelphia 's 36 . This was a much needed win for a Washington team who had lost three - straight coming into this game . The bench was spectacular tonight , as four players scored in double - figures with Ramon Sessions leading the bench with 19 points . Bradley Beal was the only other player in double figures , as he amassed 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . The Sixers will look to get out of this slide on Monday against the Phoenix Suns . This was one of Washington 's best games of the season , as they got to sit the starters for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The Spurs came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Lakers 29 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Lakers were also able to force the Lakers into 8 turnovers , while only committing eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the free throw line to finish with a game - high of 26 points , while also adding nine rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 25 points and 8 rebounds per game . Jordan Clarkson added 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with six rebounds and four assists . After shooting just 24 percent ( 3 - 14 FG ) from the field in Sunday 's game against the Clippers , it was good to see him get things turned back around . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry , with DeMar DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role . However , when quality opponents come calling , the void felt by the absence of a player of Lowry 's caliber eventually rears its ugly head . Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley Beal to pull out the tough road win . The pair combined for nearly half of Toronto 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 8 in the first 5:54 of the period . On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall . Bogdanovic paced the Raptors overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform . His effort included a sensational 6 - for - 7 tally from behind the arc . Beal followed with 23 points , three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Morris followed with a 13 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and a block . Cory Joseph provided 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas mustered a modest seven points but did haul in 11 boards and dish out one assist . The two teams now head back to the Nation 's Capital for the second game of the home - and - home series , which unfolds on Friday night .

The Celtics were led by Mirza Teletovic , who went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 0 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 20 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 10 rebounds . He 's been on an absolute tear of late , posting four double - doubles in a row , while averaging 17 points and 9 rebounds over that span . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Toronto actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 47 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross , drawing his first start in an Fred Noel led the bench with 13 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Sixers return home to face off with the New York Knicks on Christmas Day , while the Sixers remain home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 6 - 7 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 6 - 8 ) Monday 93 - 89 at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . After losing the first quarter , the Bucks bounced back in a big way , winning the next two periods 46 - 50 . They eventually pulled out what is their more impressive win in what has been a rather slow start to the regular season . Going against his former team , Serge Ibaka shined , scoring 21 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) to go with nine rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Bucks are now just a half - game behind the Heat for the fourth seed in the Eastern Conference , so they own just a half game ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth spot . The Bucks , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings , a half game ahead of the ninth - place Rockets . The Bucks are now just 3 games ahead of the eighth - place Grizzlies and one game ahead of the Thunder at the No . 8 spot . With the loss , the Magic have won four straight and will hope to continue that trend as they visit the Golden State Warriors on Saturday . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 110 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . Indiana were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this 11 - point win . The Pacers took care of business in the second half , outscoring the Hornets , 55 - 35 . A 28 - 16 run in the third and fourth quarter was the decisive moment , as Charlotte led by two before that run . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Indiana recording 24 assists to just 11 turnovers , while Charlotte committed 13 turnovers to 16 assists . Myles Turner led the Hornets in scoring , as he tallied 22 points and seven rebounds on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Nicolas Batum accrued 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Marvin Williams amassed 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 14 points , while C.J . Miles provided 14 points , three rebounds and two assists of his own off the pine . On deck for Charlotte is a home matchup versus the Toronto Raptors on Friday . In fact , neither team grabbed a double - digit lead , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards going 15 - of - 24 and the Nuggets hitting just 4 - of - 26 from long distance . Washington also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Denver , while committing six less turnovers . A game that was expected to be a grind - it - out defensive battle largely fulfilled that prophecy , with Brooklyn finally able to pull away on the strength of a pair of standout efforts from their two best players , and an injury to one of their opponent 's key pieces . Deron Williams and Dirk Nowitzki were particularly effective on the defensive end , combining for 41 of the team 's 104 points . Fittingly , it was Williams , the elder statesmen of the group , who led the way , tallying 23 points , six rebounds , two assists , two blocks , a steal and a block on 8 - of - 13 shooting . The Mavs shot a stellar 52 percent from the field overall and an even more dismal 44 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are just a game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Monday .

Win or lose , Anthony Davis has been posting historic numbers left and right this season . On Tuesday , that translated into 35 points and seven rebounds en route to a shattering blowout of the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves . The game marked Davis 's third 35 - point outing in just 16 this season , a league - high . It was also Davis 's eighth double - double of the season . Davis has now scored 44 or more points in three of his last four comments , only failing to do so in a blowout in which he sat due to a minor injury . Thanks in large part to Davis 's 59 percent shooting night , he shot just 13 - of - 17 and had just two turnovers on the night . The Wolves ' bench was particularly effective , as Shabazz Muhammad ( 13 points ) and Dante Cunningham ( 11 points ) were the only other players in double - digits . Dante Cunningham had a solid outing off the bench , scoring 13 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting . As a team , New Orleans shot a stellar 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc . Up next , the Pelicans will look to extend their win streak to three games when they take on the Thunder on Friday , while the Timberwolves will look to get back on the right track against the Warriors on Friday . For the Pelicans , it was an uphill climb to try to unseat the West 's top team . Anthony Davis put forth another Herculean effort with 35 points and seven rebounds , while Karl-Anthony Towns had a double - double of 20 points and 13 rebounds .

Despite out - rebounding the Bulls 34 - 34 , the Knicks were forced into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Derrick Rose , who went 13 - for - 24 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also chipping in with three assists and two steals . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 33 points and 35 rebounds over his last two games . Kristaps Porzingis continued to play well as well , recording a double - double with 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate as well , converting on 3 - of - 5 attempts from beyond the arc . Rookie Kristaps Porzingis added 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , 10 rebounds and three blocked shots . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

The Pistons shot 46 percent from the field , while they held the Bulls to only 44 percent shooting . Taj Gibson also tallied a double - double , with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with two steals , two blocks and one assist , in 29 minutes . The Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 5 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 12 ) 122 - 96 on Sunday . Phoenix has won four straight games and are defining themselves as a contender to win the Western Conference this season . Isaiah Thomas once again led the Suns in scoring , putting up a game - high 23 points to go with eight assists over 24 minutes . Philadelphia has lost three straight and five of their last six games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Sixers ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Sixers continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Markieff Morris scored a career - high 18 points to go with four rebounds and three blocks in 23 minutes . The Suns shot 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , but they gave up 20 points on 17 turnovers to give away the game . They 'll return home to host the Sacramento Kings on Sunday . Philadelphia has lost two straight , and while they 've tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Sixers will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Sixers have the right guys to build a winning team around . Isaiah Thomas led the way for Philadelphia , scoring a game - high 23 points and dishing out eight assists in 24 minutes . Philadelphia will go on the road to play the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Miami Heat , 112 - 104 , at TD Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Celtics ( 10 - 7 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . The Miami Heat defeated the Golden State Warriors 105 - 102 Monday at AmericanAirlines Arena . After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Heat to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Friday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Suns did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 25 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 25 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Suns did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Magic into 20 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Markieff Morris had his way with the Magic . He went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 20 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 25 rebounds on the year . Eric Bledsoe also had a solid all - around game . He went 3 - for - 7 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding nine rebounds and nine assists . He shot a combined 4 - for - 11 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , PJ Tucker chipped in with 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and five rebounds of his own . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 125 - 109 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Denver leading for much of the first half , the Cavs took control in the fourth quarter , outscoring Denver , 33 - 23 . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Cavaliers winning that battle , 45 - 45 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 13 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Kyrie Irving led the Nuggets in scoring , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds and five assists . Kevin Love shot just 5 - of - 11 from the field , but totaled 16 points and eight rebounds . Kyrie Irving was the player of the game , as he accumulated 27 points , four rebounds and five assists . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , tallying 27 points and five assists . Kevin Love was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and nine rebounds . Jameer Nelson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . On deck for Cleveland is a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday . Denver ( 37 - 16 ) have now lost four - straight games , as they continue to show how dangerous they can be . LeBron James was the player of the game , as he collected 27 points , five rebounds , 12 assists and two steals on 11 - of - 16 shooting . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , tallying 27 points and five assists . Kevin Love was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and nine rebounds . Will Barton and Will Barton both scored in double figures off the bench for the Cavaliers .

The Bulls were also able to force the Nets into 22 turnovers , while committing only 19 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bulls were led by Nikola Mirotic , who went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 16 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Butler on the other hand went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line , but still finished with 22 points , six rebounds and two assists . It was n't his best shooting performance of the season , but he still was able to turn it into his fourth double - double of the year .
