The Washington Wizards defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 94 , at Smoothie King Center on Monday . The Wizards were expected to win this game easily , but Washington took care of business in this wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Wizards led by 17 after the first quarter and took a 25 - point lead into the half . Rebounding was the difference , with Washington wining that battle , 45 - 42 . They also took care of business shooting the ball , hitting 51 percent of their shots to the Pelicans 45 percent . Washington took advantage of the assist - to - turnover ratio as well , recording 6 more assists than New Orleans , while committing five less turnovers . The Pelicans ( 19 - 29 ) had a tough task here against a hot Wizards team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Jrue Holiday was the player of the game , as he collected 26 points , four rebounds and 11 assists . Marcin Gortat totaled 17 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks . Otto Porter was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 13 points and six rebounds . Otto Porter led the team in scoring , dropping 21 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting . Donatas Motiejunas provided a double - double off the bench , totaling 13 points and six rebounds . The Pelicans play again on Monday , as they host the Indiana Pacers for their next game . The Pelicans ( 19 - 29 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 18th win in 31 games at home . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 17 points and 11 rebounds .

Especially Memphis , as they shot 38 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Grizzlies really turned it on , as they outscored the Grizzlies 40 to 27 . The Kings got it done with defense , as they held the Grizzlies to 38 percent shooting and forced them to commit 13 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Sacramento recording 18 assists to the Grizzlies 19 . The Grizzlies have been terrible in the second half , but they can still play spoiler to teams fighting for playoff positioning . Rookie Marc Gasol was the player of the game , as he tallied 20 points and 13 rebounds . The Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 50 - 11 ) 94 - 87 on Wednesday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Golden State , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Bulls really turned it on , as they outscored the Warriors 15 to 15 in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Bulls recorded 19 assists and 15 turnovers , while the Bulls committed 15 turnovers to their 19 assists . It 's rare to see a team win a game when your turnovers and assists are nearly identical , but that was the case here . The Bulls won the rebounding total 49 to 41 and that very well may have been the decisive factor . The Bulls were outscored by 10 in the fourth quarter and just couldn’t hold off the Warriors in overtime for a devastating loss . Jimmy Butler wasn’t the hero , as he sneakily drew a foul with less than a second left and sinked the two free - throws to win the game . Chicago had won three of their last four coming into this , but couldn’t hold a late lead on the road against a struggling Bulls team . They made some crucial mistakes late that ultimately cost them the game , and that 's strange considering this team thrives off their veteran leadership . Stephen Curry led all scorers , as he finished with 23 points on 10 - of - 27 shooting . Draymond Green flirted with yet another triple - double , as he accumulated 12 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and eight rebounds in the loss . Bobby Portis also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 17 points and 13 rebounds . The Bulls will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday .
The Lakers benefited from balanced production across their roster , as all five starters , and two reserves , hit double digits in the scoring column . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Jazz ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Wednesday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 6 - 7 ) 111 - 89 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their third straight loss Wednesday . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 38 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 20 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , while also adding seven rebounds and nine assists in 27 minutes . He 's really stepped up his game in the absence of Jamal Crawford , as Hayward is averaging 22 points and 3 assists over his last five games . The Thunder also received some solid contributions from their bench with both Dion Waiters and Anthony Morrow reaching double figures . Waiters had 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds , while Morrow finished with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and two steals . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

In fact , no team led by more than 9 points , as this was a single - digit game for well over 25 minutes . Memphis did most of their damage in the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 36 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Grizzlies hitting 36 percent of their three - pointers and 67 percent of their free - throws . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 34 - 39 . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New York Knicks , 107 - 102 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday night . Although both teams entered the game with losing records , they engaged in an exciting and tightly - contested offensive affair through three quarters . Both defenses clamped down in the final 10 minutes , however , and the Knicks ( 8 - 8 ) held a tenuous 102 - 102 edge with 1:32 remaining . That 's when the Hornets ' Kemba Walker went down , posting a team - high 28 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , three assists , three blocks and a steal while shooting an outstanding 9 - of - 21 from the field . The Knicks ( 8 - 8 ) were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 28 points , three assists , two rebounds , a steal and three blocks . Kristaps Porzingis was right behind him with a 25 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of blocks . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist produced a 11 - point , 8 - rebound double - double , while Cody Zeller posted a 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two blocks and a steal . Courtney Lee totaled 14 points , two rebounds and three assists . Frank Kaminsky III led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and three assists , while Ramon Sessions and Ramon Sessions paced the Knicks bench with a pair of 14 - point efforts . New York dropped to 8 - 8 and currently resides in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They remain home for a showdown against the Heat on Wednesday .

The Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) narrowly escaped Phoenix with the win , as the Suns ( 12 - 26 ) used a strong second half to come within two points , with 3:20 left in the fourth . The Cavs started out with a huge 41 - point first quarter but the Suns retaliated in the third , winning the quarter 37 - 37 , to bring the score to 93 - 90 at the start of the fourth . However , the Cavs were able to hang on to escape with a four - point win . Cleveland 's big three earned their keep in this one , as they combined for 40 points in the first half , and the Curry-Thompson combination scored 31 points . LeBron James finished with a game - high 28 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with eight rebounds and four assists , in 40 minutes . TJ Warren poured in 15 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench , while rookie Marquese Chriss chipped in 12 points on 4 - of - 11 shooting , in 33 minutes off the bench . Williams scored a team - high 30 points and hit six three - pointers . As a team , the Suns shot a whopping 45 percent from the field and reached the free - throw line 35 times . The Suns , meanwhile , saw struggles from their own star . Star D'Angelo Russell had just seven points on 2 - of - 8 shooting , but only managed seven points on just 2 - of - 8 shooting from the field . Phoenix ( 12 - 25 ) , meanwhile , has been surging lately , pushing their way to the playoff picture after a dismal 10 - 30 start to the season . On Sunday , the Lakers showed the intensity that led them to their playoff push , out - rebounding the Suns by seven and coming away with 15 forced turnovers . Center Roy Hibbert led the team with 15 points on an efficient 7 - of - 10 from the field . The team hit just 36 percent of its shots on the night .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 117 - 104 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers took a 27 - 17 lead after the first quarter , as they never trailed after that . The Indiana offense was as efficient as ever , going 50 percent from the field , 41 percent from three - point range and 92 percent from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Pacers winning that battle , 38 - 32 . Orlando ( 15 - 20 ) have not been able to get a winning - streak going this season , as their defense continues to falter . Serge Ibaka led the starters in scoring , as he totaled 17 points and six rebounds in the defeat . Nikola Vucevic led the team in scoring , as he accrued 18 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Jeff Green provided 17 points on his own off the bench on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Aaron Gordon went just 4 - of - 10 from the field , to finish with 13 points and six rebounds . On deck for the Magic is a road matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday . Indiana ( 17 - 18 ) needed this win after a poor stretch and they did n't let fans down in this offensive showcase . Myles Turner was the player of the game , as he accumulated 23 points , 12 rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Paul George was second on the team , collecting 19 points , five rebounds and three assists . Jeff Teague scored just 12 points , but dished out nine assists in the win . Off the bench , Al Jefferson scored 12 points , while Aaron Brooks dropped 14 of his own . Indiana will look to keep rolling against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday .

They also forced 13 turnovers from the Hawks , and held them to a 51 percent success rate from the field and 48 percent from three - point range . Four Raptors tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Toronto shot a stellar 51 percent from the field . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 28 - 23 in the first quarter alone . He 's averaging 11 points and 22 rebounds on the season . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Rockets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

Friday 's defeat tied a not - so - prestigious franchise record for most losses in a single season . The Indiana Pacers ( 19 - 15 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 21 - 13 ) 100 - 103 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Indiana . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 29 - 19 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Pacers also secured the Heat advantage , going 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 38 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers were led by the duo of Dwyane Wade and Dwyane Wade . Wade went 9 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 18 points and 11 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 11 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Monta Ellis was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 3 FT ) , but he still finished with 17 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 13 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists . Rodney Stuckey also did his best to keep the Heat in this game , going 8 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 10 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Ian Mahinmi finished with 13 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) and nine rebounds in 33 minutes . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only seven points against the Nets on Sunday . Ian Mahinmi was dialed in with his shot , going 4 - for - 5 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 13 points in 33 minutes . Jordan Hill had a solid showing as well , going 5 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from beyond the arc to score 10 points . The Heat 's next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Heat will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 16 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 12 - 12 ) 88 - 86 on Wednesday . Memphis put a stop to their four - game losing streak with the win . They were wading through one of the more difficult stretches of their schedule , so the prolonged losing streak was n't entirely surprising , and neither was the fact that they were able to snap their losing streak against the Blazers . Portland 's shooting faltered down the stretch , however , and the Trail Blazers were unable to close the gap . The Trail Blazers shot 36 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Portland won the rebounding battle 58 - 52 and committed 12 turnovers to the Grizzlies 12 . The Blazers also shot well , going 36 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . They also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle 58 - 52 and the Blazers committed 12 turnovers to the Trail Blazers 12 . The Blazers have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Marc Gasol had a nice game in this game , as he amassed six points , 18 rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . C.J . McCollum really struggled , as he went 6 - for - 6 from the field and committed four turnovers in the defeat . Damian Lillard did all he could to keep the Trail Blazers hanging around , as he accumulated 19 points , three rebounds and six assists in the defeat . He did however miss a game - tying three at the buzzer that would have sent the game into overtime . Portland will look to bounce back on Sunday against the Los Angeles Clippers .

It 's rare to see the Lakers and Nuggets match up this late in the season with a combined winning percentage under 30 , but that 's the way this season is going for both teams . Denver took a 16 - point lead into the half , but the Nuggets responded with a big third quarter and pull out the victory . The Lakers shot 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc compared to the Lakers , who only scored 14 points in the fourth quarter . Nikola Jokic had a quiet night for the Lakers , finishing with eight points and 12 rebounds in 22 minutes . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 4 ) 102 - 93 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 20 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 18 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Pelicans on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 24 points paced New Orleans , and he added four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . LaMarcus Aldridge was right behind with 22 points , nine rebounds , two assists and a steal . Jrue Holiday followed with 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and three steals . The bench was led by a pair of 11 - point efforts from Eric Gordon and Tyreke Evans , with the former adding five rebounds and two assists , and the latter posting five rebounds , two assists and a steal . Eric Gordon paced the reserves with 11 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Trail Blazers are currently in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and in possession of the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Indiana for a Wednesday showdown with the Pacers .

The Jazz ( 40 - 24 ) picked up their 40th win of the season and continue to rise in the Western Conference behind stellar play from Rudy Gobert . The elite center for Utah tipped in the buzzer beater for the win over the Kings on Sunday , and came up with another ridiculous stat line on Monday , as he finished with 15 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks across 36 minutes of action . The Pelicans simply could not find a rhythm shooting the ball , and finished with a season worst 36 percent as a unit . They allowed multiple Jazz scoring runs and did not have a single lead throughout the entirety of the game . The Pelicans picked up their first win with DeMarcus Cousins on Sunday , but were unable to do the same on the second game of a back - to - back . Cousins finished with 15 points , eight boards and three assists on 5 - of - 15 shooting , while Anthony Davis added 20 points and 12 rebounds across 37 minutes . The Jazz were led in scoring by Gordon Hayward , who finished with 23 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting . He was the only efficient scorer amongst the starters , as Utah finished just 36 percent shooting from the field as a team . Next up , the Pelicans visit the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday , while the Pelicans play the same day when they host the Toronto Raptors .

The Boston Celtics defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 117 - 108 , at TD Garden on Friday . The Celtics ( 23 - 14 ) learned earlier in the afternoon that they 'd play without Avery Bradley , who 'd tallied a team - high 26 points on Friday versus the Sixers . Marcus Smart entered the starting five in his stead and did n't disappoint , producing 22 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . However , the high - scoring affair was a showcase for two of the game 's brightest stars , as Isaiah Thomas ( 38 points ) and Anthony Davis ( 36 points , 20 rebounds , two assists , two blocks ) put on a spectacular show on opposite ends of the court . Ultimately , a 36 - point third quarter by Boston did in the Pelicans ( 14 - 24 ) , which suffered their 13th road loss in 17 games this season . Langston Galloway was actually the second leading scorer on New Orleans in a bench role , posting 20 points , four rebounds and an assist over 22 minutes . Jrue Holiday was next with 13 points , five assists , a rebound , two steals and a block . Buddy Hield led the first unit with a 15 - point effort that also included six rebounds , six assists and two steals . Gerald Green paced the second unit with 15 points and three boards . Isaiah Thomas paced the Pelicans with 38 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Marcus Smart was next with a bench - leading 20 points , along with four rebounds , an assist and a pair of steals . Al Horford and Jrue Holiday followed with matching 8 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds , eight assists and two blocks , and the latter registering five boards and four assists . Kelly Olynyk led the second unit with 12 points , four rebounds and four assists , while Kelly Olynyk offered 12 points , four assists and four rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Pelicans continue on their trek through the Northeast with a visit to the New York Knicks on Wednesday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Toronto Raptors north of the border on Tuesday evening .
The Chicago Bulls ( 35 - 33 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 33 - 36 ) 92 - 85 on Monday . The Bulls came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Bulls team . The key for Chicago was their defense , as they held the Jazz to 41 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Bulls recorded 24 assists and 11 turnovers , while the Bulls committed 10 turnovers to just 22 assists . The Bulls played this game without a suspended Doug McDermott and they really did n't show up in their last game . Jimmy Butler flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 13 points , five rebounds and six assists in the win . Taj Mirotic led the team in scoring , dropping 15 points on 5 - for - 12 shooting . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double in the win , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Taj Mirotic also played well , as he totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds and three steals . The Jazz have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next matchup . The Bulls continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . Taj Gibson played one of his best games of the season , as he amassed 15 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Derrick Favors led the team with 24 points , as he also provided six rebounds and two blocks in the loss . Taj Mirotic also had one of his best games of the season , as he amassed 15 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . The Bulls will look to keep things rolling on Friday against the Atlanta Hawks .
The Houston Rockets ( 38 - 17 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 34 ) 128 - 104 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 35 - 28 right away in the first quarter . The Rockets shot much better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 48 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets were also able to force the Magic into 16 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Rockets were led by Serge Ibaka in this one . Ibaka went 13 - for - 20 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 30 points and 20 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 25 points and 21 rebounds on the year . Evan Fournier was able to record 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) of his own , but did it on the defensive side of the ball with two steals . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday .

The key for Philadelphia was their three - point shooting , as they went 9 - of - 32 from long distance , while Denver went just 12 - of - 27 from long range . Nikola Jokic was second on the team , as he totaled 18 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Emmanuel Mudiay carried the load for Denver , as he tallied 11 points , two rebounds and three assists on 4 - of - 9 shooting . The Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 21 ) 102 - 98 on Friday . Los Angeles has won two straight games . J.J. Lin led the way with a game - high 21 points and seven assists in 34 minutes . Carlos Boozer had a double - double of his own , recording 18 points and eight rebounds . The Lakers will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Friday . Los Angeles has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 36 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc Saturday . Rajon Rondo played a game - high 35 minutes and finished with 15 points and seven assists . Tyson Chandler returned from a three - game absence and finished with seven points and one rebound over 26 minutes . The Mavericks will return home to host the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday . Dallas has lost two straight and six of their last seven games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Lakers ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Mavericks continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Rajon Rondo had his best game of the season , putting up a game - high 21 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting and seven rebounds in 35 minutes . Tyson Chandler also corralled a double - double , posting 15 points and 12 rebounds in 31 minutes . Wesley Johnson was the only other Lakers player to score in double figures , finishing with 11 points in 29 minutes . Up next , the Lakers will travel to Minnesota Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while the Lakers will head to San Antonio Wednesday to play the Spurs .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 1 - 2 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 0 - 2 ) 93 - 90 on Thursday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Thunder were able to out - score the Clippers 59 - 42 in the second half to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . They were the superior shooters , going 39 percent from the field and 23 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also converted on 17 - of - 28 attempts from the free throw line , while the Thunder made just 10 - of - 27 , giving them just enough of an advantage to come out with the win . The Clippers were led by Perry Griffin , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 32 points , to go along with seven rebounds and three assists . He was able to get to the line 11 times and converted on 7 - of - 10 free throw attempts . Serge Ibaka recorded a double - double , as he posted 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 22 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford shot 5 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 16 points . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 112 - 95 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . This game meant much more to Boston than Philly and that proved to be the case in the final scoreline . Despite the 76ers leading for the final 33 minutes , this game was close throughout , with the 76ers never leading by more than 10 points . Three-point shooting really killed the Sixers , as they went just 10 - of - 31 from long distance , while the 76ers went 14 - of - 7 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with Boston recording 31 assists to 17 turnovers , while Philadelphia matched their assists and turnovers at 12 a piece . Scoring in the paint was extremely lopsided as well , with Boston winning that battle , 66 - 33 . Free-throw shooting really killed Philadelphia , as they went 36 - of - 42 , while the Celtics went 22 - of - 27 . Boston also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 41 - 46 . Jahlil Okafor was the lone bright spot for Philadelphia , as he led the team with 26 points and seven rebounds off the bench . Nerlens Noel recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points and 13 rebounds . Isaiah Canaan was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 18 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Isaiah Thomas carried the load for Philadelphia , as he led the team with 27 points , two rebounds and seven assists . Nerlens Noel started for Tyson Chandler and amassed 14 points and 13 rebounds .
The Lakers benefited from balanced production across their roster , as all five starters , and two reserves , hit double digits in the scoring column . The offensive proficiency led to a 46 percent success rate from the field , and their defense managed to elicit 11 turnovers from the Bucks . Julius Antetokounmpo and Michael Carter-Williams co - led the Lakers with matching 19 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block , and the latter supplying five boards , three assists , two steals and a block . Jabari Parker supplied 12 points , four rebounds and three assists . Jordan Clarkson was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points and one rebound . Kobe Bryant 's 22 points led the way for the Bucks , a total he complemented with six assists and three rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo was next with 15 points , six rebounds and five assists . Jordan Clarkson matched Clarkson 's point total and added three assists and four rebounds . Miles Young posted nine points , two assists , one rebound and two steals in 21 minutes as a reserve as well . D'Angelo Russell led the way for Milwaukee with 19 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Julius Antetokounmpo was next with a near double - double of 15 points , nine rebounds , five assists and a block . Jordan Clarkson turned in 12 points , six boards , three assists and three steals . John Henson supplied six points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals .

Using a big second quarter , where they outscored the Nets 28 - 29 , the Pelicans were able to pick up a large enough lead by halftime that they could coast to an easy 20 - point victory on the road in Brooklyn . They shot much better in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets finished at 48 percent from the floor and 45 percent from deep . Along with the strong start , the Nets also out - rebounded the Nets 48 - 44 . Tyreke Evans continues to show himself as one of the best players in the league . The Atlanta Hawks ( 34 - 28 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 51 ) 106 - 77 on Sunday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 34 percent from the floor and a meager 19 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Hawks also secured a 39 - 46 rebounding advantage , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by the duo of Julius Randle and Kyle Korver . Randle went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 16 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 14 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Kyle Korver was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 12 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and eight assists , while Huertas added 10 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two rebounds . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Spurs road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nuggets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , San Antonio had managed a paltry three wins in 13 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 75 points over the first 28 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for San Antonio , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Spurs roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 42 percent shooting from beyond the arc , and an impressive 36 percent success rate from three - point range . Denver was led by Kenneth Faried , who produced a 26 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Tony Parker tallied 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Jusuf Nurkic had a near double - double with 10 points , nine rebounds , two assists and a block . However , Ty Lawson ( four points ) , Danny Green ( six points ) and Danny Green ( six points ) underwhelmed , while JJ Lawson went scoreless over 34 minutes . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo 's 21 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Tim Duncan followed with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic and Tim Duncan followed with a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter furnishing five rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic and Wilson Chandler paced the reserves with a pair of 11 - point efforts . The former added five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , while the latter pitched in with four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Manu Ginobili paced the reserves with 11 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . The Nuggets head back home to take on the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday night , while the Nuggets head to the Big Apple to tangle with the New York Knicks on Saturday evening .

The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Houston Rockets , 128 - 121 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two of the worst defenses in the NBA , the more potent offense was able to prevail with a victory . Milwaukee really turned it on in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Rockets , 36 - 29 . Milwaukee took advantage of the interior , outscoring Houston , 59 - 41 in that paint . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with the Bucks recording 30 assists to 17 turnovers , while the Rockets committed 16 turnovers to 30 assists . Khris Middleton led the Bucks in scoring , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds , four assists and five steals . Giannis Antetokounmpo was second on the team , accumulating 18 points , 16 rebounds , 11 assists and four blocks . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 20 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Jerryd Bayless led the way for Milwaukee , as he dropped 18 points , three rebounds and four assists on 6 - of - 10 shooting . Jerryd Bayless came off the bench to provide 18 points , three rebounds and four assists . James Harden led the way for Milwaukee , as he accumulated 26 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Jerryd Bayless led the team in scoring , dropping 18 points off the bench . Trevor Ariza provided 20 points , eight rebounds and two assists , while Beverley collected 13 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals .
The New Orleans Lakers ( 11 - 41 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 31 ) 96 - 96 on Sunday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Pelicans have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went just 46 percent from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Pelicans also secured a 40 - 40 rebounding advantage , just furthering their dominance in this one . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Anthony Davis and Kobe Bryant . Davis went 10 - for - 25 from the field and 7 - for - 12 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 39 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 39 points and 8 rebounds per game . Jrue Holiday was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 19 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , nine assists and two steals , while Randle recorded 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds in 20 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 48 points and 13 assists over those two matchups . Recording a double - double of his own , Julius Randle finished with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and three assists . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Julius Randle , who recorded 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds in 32 minutes . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

Following a pair of Tyus Jones free throws , Jameer Nelson answered for Denver with a driving layup to bring the score within one point . Andrew Wiggins went on to miss one of the free throws on the following possession , but Nelson was unable to hit the 17 - foot jumper and the Timberwolves came away with the win . Wiggins knocked down 10 shots and finished with 24 points , while Kris Dunn added 10 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and three steals across 34 minutes . Shabazz Muhammad contributed 20 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to lead the Minnesota bench . As for the Nuggets , Gary Harris led the way with 22 points , while Jamal Murray had an efficient outing across 20 minutes , as the rookie posted 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Boston Celtics ( 8 - 6 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 4 - 9 ) 99 - 93 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Right from the tip - off , the Celtics were clearly the better offensive team in this one . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . They shot 45 percent from the field and 17 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves shot only 42 percent from the floor and a meager 17 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Timberwolves also out - rebounded the Timberwolves 39 - 51 , giving them even more of an advantage . Isaiah Thomas did most of the damage for the Timberwolves . He went 9 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 24 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Isaiah Thomas also had a solid showing of his own , scoring 29 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) and handing out three assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Al Horford had a strong showing as well , finishing with 20 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt ) , six rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 20 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Terry Rozier had 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and four assists in 31 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be on the road against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

Too much should n't be read into the correlation , but it 's worth mentioning , because if the team does n't like the direction they 're heading with Conley this season , he could end up on the trade block with his contract set to expire . The Grizzlies were up 40 points at the half and held the Grizzlies to just 21 points in the fourth quarter . James finished the game with 25 points , 11 assists , and one rebound in 38 minutes of action . Dion Waiters scored 21 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting in 28 minutes off the bench . Jon Leuer ( 16 ) and Vince Carter ( 11 ) round out the Grizzlies players in double figures . The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 102 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 13 - 25 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Lakers ( 22 - 15 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Memphis forced the same 62 percent from the field and draining 11 of their 0 - point attempts . Gasol led the way for the visitors with 19 points , six rebounds , seven assists and a steal . D'Angelo Russell tallied 18 points , six assists and four rebounds . Zach Randolph turned in a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Andrew Harrison went for 10 points , one rebound and one assist . Vince Carter led the bench with 12 points , two boards , one assist and one steal . Zach Randolph was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points , nine rebounds and one assist . Marc Gasol paced the Grizzlies with 22 points , six rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Mike Russell tallied 18 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Lou Williams led the second unit with 14 points , and Vince Carter paced the second unit with 16 points .
The Chicago Bulls ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 0 - 1 ) 97 - 95 on Tuesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Cavaliers were able to bounce back with a convincing 19 - point victory in game two . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Cavaliers 26 - 17 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 43 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 43 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , five assists and one steal as well . He had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 20 percent ( 3 - 17 FG ) from the field , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , E'Twaun Jefferson shot well , going 4 - for - 7 from the field and 2 - for - 0 from the free throw line to score 10 points , while also adding six rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 28 - 23 ) 108 - 87 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 21 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 14 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 14 turnovers between them , but the Suns managed to stay a step ahead of the Suns on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Aldridge totaled 18 points , 13 rebounds , an assist , a steal and two blocks . Wesley Matthews managed 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Robin Lopez had a near double - double with 11 points , 12 rebounds , two steals and four blocks , and C.J . McCollum contributed 12 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal . Phoenix remains in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Philadelphia to face the Sixers on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Orlando Magic , 109 - 79 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Magic ( 12 - 17 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Magic ( 12 - 17 ) , managing a 49 percent success rate from the floor and 14 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Magic ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 14 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Orlando ( 12 - 17 ) was led by DeMar DeRozan , who poured in a game - high 31 points on 13 - of - 21 shooting , including 1 - of - 3 from long distance , along with five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas followed with a 16 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included a block . Evan Fournier went for 15 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic posted a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , three blocks and one steal . Terrence Ross led the second unit with 11 points , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . The Magic head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Magic remain home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .
The New York Hornets ( 5 - 15 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 5 - 15 ) 102 - 103 on Friday . Charlotte has won two straight , overcoming the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday and now the Hornets on the second night of a back - to - back set . While some will point to Lance Stephenson 's ( groin ) absence in the games and argue that the Hornets play better without him , the level of the Hornets ' opponent can not be overlooked . The Sixers and Hornets are young teams . With or without Stephenson , the Hornets should have had this weekend 's games circled as projected wins . Carmelo Anthony scored a game - high 32 points , and Carmelo Anthony hit a game - high 4 - of - 15 three - point attempts . He also recorded 32 points , seven rebounds , four assists , and one steal in 42 minutes . The Hornets have two days off before going on the road to play the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday . Charlotte has lost two straight , and while they 've tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Hornets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . The Hornets will look to extend their winning streak when they host the Washington Wizards on Sunday . Charlotte has lost two of their last three as they seem to be finally adapating to playing without Kawhi Leonard ( hand ) and Tony Parker ( hamstring ) who remain sidelined indefinitely . The return of Jason Shumpert ( knee ) and Marvin Biyombo ( wrist ) were out for the team . Gerald Henderson had a nice game , putting up 22 points in 31 minutes off the bench . The Hornets will go on the road to face the New York Knicks on Saturday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 3 ) 105 - 99 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Magic into 20 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his triple - double . He finished with 23 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 11 FT ) , six rebounds and nine assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . He shot 7 - for - 16 from the floor and 2 - for - 6 from beyond the arc to score 22 points . Love has now combined for 52 points in his last two outings , as he 's had to step up without Dwyane Wade playing . Kyrie Irving had a solid showing as well , going 7 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 20 points . He also got to the line 11 times and converted on seven of those attempts . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Indiana Pacers , 110 - 106 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . San Antonio were expected to win this game easily , but it took a monster second half to do so . In fact , San Antonio outscored Indiana , 54 - 67 in the second half . Defense was key for the Spurs , as they held the Pacers to 49 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , Kawhi Leonard finished with 27 points , which may have been the difference in the game . San Antonio shot 46 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pacers to 67 percent from the field and 45 percent from long range . Kawhi Leonard led Indiana in scoring , as he accumulated 32 points , six rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner was second on the team , finishing with 22 points and six rebounds . Jeff Teague started at point guard and provided 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . Kawhi George was the player of the game , as he accumulated 32 points , six rebounds , three assists and five steals . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team , amassing 19 points and seven rebounds , Kevin Seraphin came off the bench and contributed 12 points and 11 rebounds . On deck for the Spurs is a road matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday . The Pacers ( 29 - 26 ) had won six of 12 headed into this game , but a date with this Spurs defense is one of the toughest in the league . Kawhi Leonard did all he could for Indiana , as he led the team with 32 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jeff Teague finished with 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . LaMarcus Aldridge totaled 19 points , seven rebounds and four steals .
The Houston Rockets ( 29 - 13 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 28 ) 110 - 98 on Monday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Rockets got out to an extremely quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 29 - 21 right away in the first quarter . The Pacers made a run in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Pacers 21 - 30 , but their comeback came up just short and the Rockets were able to secure the victory on the road . They shot 51 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers finished at 46 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from deep . James Harden did most of the damage for the Pacers , going 12 - for - 18 from the field and 7 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 45 points , while also adding a whopping seven assists and four steals . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 50 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 45 points and 19 rebounds on the season . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double of 14 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 6 - 12 FT ) and 17 rebounds in 35 minutes . The double - double marked his second over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaged 19 points and 10 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Howard posted 14 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 6 - 12 FT ) , 17 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his second in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points in the last three games . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Solomon Hill , who scored 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 33 minutes . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

He 's been on an absolute tear of late , scoring 30 points or more in three of his last four games , while averaging 15 points and 20 rebounds over that span . Michael Carter-Williams was able to record a double - double of his own with 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and nine assists . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Taj Gibson who finished with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and three rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Bulls will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday as well .

The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Friday . Fresh off a double - digit home victory over the Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) on Thursday night , the Bucks ( 13 - 12 ) bounced back with an even more dominating effort Friday . Chicago 's offense had no answer for a stifling Milwaukee defense that held them to a season - low scoring total , while also limiting them to a 30 percent success rate from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo once again proved to be a thorn in the side of the visitors , leading the way with a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven boards , three steals and a block . Dwyane Parker was next with 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . John Henson and Tony Snell posted a pair of 10 - point efforts , supplemented by four rebounds , a steal and a pair of blocks by Henson , to go along with five rebounds and a pair of dimes from Snell . Greg Monroe came off the bench to tally a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double over 23 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic compiled 13 points for the second straight night in a reserve role , and also hauled in eight boards . A nightmarish outing for the Bulls saw Dwyane Wade pace them in scoring with a modest 12 points , which he complemented with five boards , an assist and a steal . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez posted a pair of eight - point efforts on a combined 7 - of - 20 shooting , although they at least managed 11 boards between them . Jimmy Butler and Rajon Rondo had matching seven - point contributions as well , with the former also supplying seven boards , six assists and a steal , and the latter dishing out four dimes and recording four rebounds . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 10 points and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . The Bulls are now off until Tuesday night , when the Cleveland Cavaliers will come calling to the Bradley Center . The Bulls are home again Monday night , when the Detroit Pistons come to town .

It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 47 points and 33 rebounds over his last two games . The Spurs were also able to force the Rockets into 15 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . He finished with 24 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 10 - 17 FT ) and 12 rebounds , giving the Blazers the spark needed to secure the win . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it six times previously in the season . The Suns led by as many as 18 in the fourth quarter but the Spurs battled back to make it a two - point game with 2:56 to go . Both teams went scoreless from then until J.J Bledsoe hit a three - pointer with 10 seconds left , the clock went on to fall a three - pointer . The Spurs responded with a run of their own , cutting the deficit to five points with 5:22 left in the quarter . The Spurs turned it on in the third quarter , closing the gap to just four points . Isaiah Thomas led the Suns in scoring , putting up 23 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) , to go with two rebounds , four assists and one block in 29 minutes . The Washington Wizards defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 125 - 124 , at Moda Center on Saturday . While this appeared to be a blowout at halftime , the Wizards heard something in the locker room that completely turned this game around . Portland took a 70 - 49 lead headed into the half , but they completely collapsed by allowing the Wizards to outscore them , 63 - 42 , in the second half to send it to overtime . Markieff Morris then played hero , as he hit the game - winning shot with 0 seconds left , despite the fact that it appeared he stepped out of bounds prior to the shot . Both offenses were efficient , with Washington shooting 52 percent to Portland 's 51 percent . Fastbreak points was the only noticeable difference in the stat sheet , with the Wizards winning that battle , 15 - 7 . The Wizards ( 41 - 24 ) overcame a huge halftime deficit to send this game to overtime , as this marked their second game in three nights in which they overcame a double - digit halftime deficit . John Wall was fantastic , as he led the team with 39 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Bradley Beal finished second on the team , totaling 26 points and six assists . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris each recorded a double - double , combining for 28 points and 26 rebounds . Otto Porter provided 18 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . On deck for Portland is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday . Otto Porter was second on the team , collecting 18 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Allen Crabbe came off the bench to provide 14 points , six rebounds and two assists .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 36 - 13 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 24 ) 116 - 108 in overtime Friday at the Chesapeake Energy Arena in Salt Lake City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 22 - 29 in the first quarter alone . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Thunder also secured a 57 - 40 rebounding advantage . Kevin Durant had a big game for the Rockets . He went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 9 - for - 9 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Clint Capela , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and three rebounds . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Rockets will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Dallas took a six - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Mavericks , 46 - 26 . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) had a tough task here against a desperate Mavs team and they fell just short in this tight battle . Anthony Davis led the way for New Orleans , as he tallied 30 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks . Seth Holiday was the only other starter with more than five points , as he totaled 18 points , two rebounds and three assists . Yogi Ferrell was a nice spark off the bench , providing 15 points , three rebounds and an assist . On deck for the Pelicans is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday .

The Spurs ( 42 - 8 ) jumped out to a major lead to start the game , holding a double - digit advantage in the first quarter . They only built on that lead from there , shooting a whopping 50 percent as a team en route to their highest - scoring game of the season . Reigning Defensive Player of the Year Kawhi Leonard led the team with 23 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting and came away with a pair of steals in 27 minutes . Veteran big man LaMarcus Aldridge added 14 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting . The Mavericks , meanwhile , saw struggles on the offensive end , shooting just 45 percent and 20 percent from beyond the arc . Point guard Deron Williams led the team with 23 points and knocked down three three - pointers . The team shot a stellar 51 percent and had nine three - pointers on the night . Dallas , meanwhile , shot just 45 percent and hit only six three - pointers on the night . The performance was certainly not what Dallas needed as the team looks to be in the mix for a potential playoff spot down the stretch . Dallas will host the Trail Blazers on Tuesday , while the Spurs will visit Atlanta to play the Hawks on Wednesday in a battle of two of the best frontcourts in the NBA . Dallas , meanwhile , will visit the second - place Raptors on Friday for what should be an important matchup .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 5 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 5 - 2 ) 92 - 94 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis during game five of the first round of the Western Conference playoffs . The Clippers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 26 - 25 in the first quarter alone . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 18 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 41 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Blake Griffin backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 24 points ( 9 - 19 FG . 0 - 0 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds , two assists and one steal , marking his second double - double in the last three games . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford shot 2 - for - 7 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 13 points in 20 minutes . Jamal Crawford was the only other Clipper to score in double figures , as he had 13 points in 20 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

The Pacers ( 29 - 28 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . The second half was much tighter , but Washington eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Wizards managed to shoot 52 percent from the field overall , as well as a superb 52 percent on their 29 shots from behind the arc . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 21 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 36 percent from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . Continuing his dominance of late , Pau Gasol had another huge game , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 18 rebounds and four assists . Over his last three games he 's averaging 27 points and 16 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Jimmy Butler came just shy of recording his first triple - double of the season . He finished with 19 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , five rebounds and 10 assists . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

Willy Hernangomez was huge off the bench , providing 12 points , nine rebounds and three steals . On deck for the Spurs is a home matchup against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday . The New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 17 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 7 - 17 ) 120 - 119 on Friday . Phoenix has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Suns right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Eric Bledsoe returned to the lineup after missing the last two games with a hip injury and had a double - double . He totaled 23 points , eight assists and three rebounds in 40 minutes . Leandro Barbosa followed up a 34 - point outing with 18 points off the bench . The Pelicans have two days off before hosting the Milwuakee Bucks on Wednesday . By Wednesday 's game , the Suns expect to have Thaddeus Young ( personal ) and Omer Asik ( knee ) for the remainder of the season . As a team , the Suns shot just 46 percent from the field , 34 percent from beyond the arc and 65 percent from the free - throw line . The Suns have three days off before they 'll host the Los Angeles Lakers . The Suns have two days off before going on the road to the play the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday . The Suns 's next game is on the road Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers . The Pelicans ' next game is on the road Saturday against the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 103 - 97 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . Turnover have plagued these two teams all season and 45 combined turnovers in this game shows just that . The third quarter was the difference for Philadelphia , as they outscored Philadelphia , 18 - 24 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor as well , with the Thunder recording 19 assists to 10 turnovers , while the Sixers committed 13 turnovers to just 21 assists . Russell Westbrook carried the load , as he tallied 32 points , 12 rebounds and nine assists . Joel Embiid was second on the team with 20 points and seven rebounds . Enes Kanter was a huge spark off the bench , providing 17 points and 12 rebounds . Nik Stauskas was huge off the bench , providing 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . On deck for Philadelphia is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . The 76ers ( 0 - 1 ) have been one of the worst teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 14 tries . Russell Westbrook led the way for Philadelphia , as he collected 32 points , 12 rebounds and nine assists . Sergio Rodriguez started at point guard and accumulated 12 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Enes Kanter was a nice spark off the bench , dropping 17 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Oklahoma City will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Toronto Raptors .
The Detroit Pistons ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) 103 - 86 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Nuggets shot better than the Nuggets , going 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 33 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were also able to force the Nuggets into 16 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Andre Drummond had his way with the Nuggets ' bigs . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 7 - for - 11 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 19 points , while also adding 19 rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 16 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 13 rebounds on the season . Ish Smith had a solid all - around game . He recorded 11 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , eight assists and three steals in 28 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording three or more steals in five out of his last five games . Danilo Gallinari was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 16 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) in 29 minutes . The Heats ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 14 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 15 ) 112 - 100 on Sunday . Denver has won two straight and seven of their last eight games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Timberwolves ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Timberwolves continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Andrew Wiggins scored a career - high 23 points in 34 minutes off the bench . Gary Harris posted a double - double of 15 points and a game - high 2 - for - 17 from the field . Will Barton scored 14 points and was the only other Minnesota player to score in double figures . The loss keeps the Timberwolves ' playoff hopes alive , as they are currently tied for , and hold the tiebreaker over , the Oklahoma City Thunder for the final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Contrarily , the Minnesota Timberwolves have been officially eliminated from playoff contention and do n't have much to play for as the regular season comes close to its end . Ricky Rubio missed a triple - double with 13 points , nine rebounds and nine assists . The Timberwolves have three days off before hosting the Milwuakee Bucks on Wednesday . By Wednesday 's game , the Timberwolves expect to have Thaddeus Young ( personal ) and Nikola Jokic ( knee ) back in the active lineup .
The Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 4 ) , 108 - 95 , on Tuesday at the Oracle Arena in Game 3 of the Western Conference Finals . In a matchup that featured the top two finishers in the MVP voting this season , Golden State 's Stephen Curry and Golden State 's Marc Gasol played well . Conley finished with 32 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 8 - 13 3Pt ) , six rebounds and 10 assists in 39 minutes . Marc Gasol had 21 points ( 7 - 23 FG ) , 15 rebounds and four assists in 44 minutes . Klay Thompson had 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , eight rebounds and three assists in 39 minutes . Draymond Green had 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) , 12 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 33 minutes . Andre Iguodala was the only other Grizzlies ' starter in double - figures , posting 15 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) and six rebounds in 33 minutes . Harrison Barnes ( 13 ) , Shaun Livingston ( 10 ) and Shaun Livingston ( 12 ) rounded out the Memphis players who scored in double figures . The win gives the Warriors a three - game lead over the Oklahoma City Thunder , and for the final playoff spot in the Western Conference standings , the Grizzlies were also able to pull off the win against the still - best 76ers Wednesday . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies finished at 37 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . The Warriors ' superstar backcourt duo of Stephen Curry and Marc Gasol did most of the damage in this one . Curry went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 8 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score 32 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and 10 assists . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Thompson has really struggled with his shot this season , combining to go just 2 - for - 3 from behind the three - point line over his last two games . He 's now averaging 20 points and 13 rebounds on the season . Mike Conley was able to notch a double - double of his own with 11 points ( 3 - 13 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , nine assists and two steals . The only other Hornet to reach double - digit points was Andre Iguodala , who came off the bench to score 15 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) in 33 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Jrue Holiday ( 10 - 40 ) , 123 - 100 , on Tuesday at Oracle Arena to advance to the NBA Finals for the first time in five nights . The Warriors got off to a hot start , jumping out to a nine - point lead after the first quarter . The lead reached 25 points at the half , as the Warriors outscored them 27 - 37 in the second quarter . Golden State was able to chip away at the deficit in the third quarter , and went on to outscore the Pelicans 39 - 12 in the third quarter . Golden State has now dropped two in a row and seven of its last eight . Ryan Anderson was a big contributor off the bench with 26 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , five rebounds and two assists in 46 minutes . Klay Thompson contributed 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 6 - 12 3Pt ) , four rebounds , eight assists and three steals in 40 minutes . Tyreke Evans contributed 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , four rebounds and eight assists in 40 minutes . Norris Cole ( 16 ) was the only other New Orleans player to score in double figures . The victory keeps the Warriors ' playoff hopes alive , as they are currently tied for , and hold the tiebreaker over , the Oklahoma City Thunder for the final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Contrarily , the New Orleans Pelicans have been officially eliminated from playoff contention and do n't have much to play for as the regular season comes close to its end . Stephen Curry scored a game - high 40 points ( 10 - 29 FG , 7 - 18 3Pt ) , grabbed five rebounds and dished out nine assists in 44 minutes . Ryan Anderson also scored 26 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) to go with five rebounds and two assists in 30 minutes . Draymond Green scored 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) to go with 17 rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block in 40 minutes . The Pelicans are off until Wednesday , when they take on the Thunder in New Orleans .

The Miami Heat ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 0 - 1 ) 107 - 95 on Tuesday at the Verizon Center in Washington , D.C . It was a matchup of two teams failing to live up to expectations , and both relied heavily on their star power to get through the matchup . After the Heat jumped out to a 22 - 28 lead at the end of the first quarter , the Wizards bounced back with two impressive quarters of their own , cutting the deficit to five points with 5:22 left in the quarter . The Wizards continued to claw their way back into the game , with a 16 - 3 run that spanned nearly six minutes of the third quarter . Five different players scored in the run for the Heat ' balanced attack , and 13 of their 13 dressed players made at least one field goal . Chris Bosh led the way for the Wizards with 26 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and a season - high 15 rebounds , along with four assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 39 minutes .
