The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 90 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard DeMar DeRozan in the offseason , inking the 27 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 40 points and adding four rebounds , an assist and a steal . While the stellar showing was n't necessarily a surprise from a player of his caliber , the fact that Jonas Valanciunas , and not Kyle Lowry , checked in as Toronto 's second - leading scorer was a tad more unexpected . The veteran big man dominated in his showdown with Andre Drummond , posting a 32 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . The dominant Raptors , which outscored Detroit in every quarter , did n't need much else , with Lowry the only other player to hit double digits on the scoreboard . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Tobias Harris ' 22 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Marcus Morris supplied a near double - double with 17 points , nine boards , three assists and a steal , but struggled from long range , draining only a pair of his eight three - point attempts . Drummond tallied 16 points , six rebounds and a steal , while the starting backcourt of Ish Caldwell-Pope and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope only managed 10 combined points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 45 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 43 - 26 ) 91 - 83 on Wednesday . The Cavs haven now clinched the Central Division title , but remain in a dogfight for the top seed in the Eastern Conference with the Toronto Raptors . With only a 20 - game lead coming in to the night , Cleveland finds itself in a must - win scenario for the time being every time they take the court . Fortunately , they were back at full health Tuesday , with Rudy Gobert leading the way with a team - high 20 points , which he supplemented with 19 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and two steals . The perennial All-Star looked refreshed after being held out of the Cavs ' most recent contest , a road tilt versus the Heat last Saturday . Gobert 's second consecutive game consisted of 20 points , 19 boards , and six assists . James was right behind him with a 29 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , two steals and a block . Love and Kevin Love followed with a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , three assists and a steal , and the latter posting four rebounds , three assists and a steal as well . Joe Johnson paced the Utah bench with 12 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , three assists and a steal . The Cavs are currently in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again against the Magic on Thursday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 50 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 16 - 61 ) , 116 - 111 , in Game 3 on Monday at the Staples Center . The final score would indicate a blowout , but the Kings came into this game on a mission and they sent a message to the rest of the NBA . The one asterisk to the win was that they beat the Timberwolves without Ricky Rubio , Ricky Rubio and Gary Neal , but they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Kings . Rudy Gay led the team in scoring , putting up 33 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting and grabbing five rebounds . Ray McCallum added 13 points , while Chase Budinger had 13 points off the bench . Up next , the Timberwolves will travel to Denver Friday to take on the Nuggets , while the Timberwolves will head to Los Angeles Friday to go up against the Clippers . The Timberwolves will head to Los Angeles to take on the Lakers on Friday , as the Timberwolves will head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder , also on Friday , in what will be the second night of a back - to - back . The Kings saw all five starters score in double figures , with Omri Casspi leading the way with a career - high 31 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting . Zach LaVine scored 21 of his own , while also grabbing five rebounds . Derrick Williams was the only other Timberwolves player to score in double figures , finishing with 18 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting in 31 minutes . Next up , the Timberwolves host the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday , while the Kings visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) 99 - 92 on Tuesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets continue to struggle , with this loss marking their third in a row . Despite out - rebounding the Nets 47 - 39 , they were forced into 14 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by a big game from Kyle Korver , who went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 19 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Jeff Teague was able to post a double - double , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two assists . He had gone a combined 19 - for - 19 from the field over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction Sunday . Thaddeus Young also had a solid contribution off the bench , scoring 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been dialed in with his shot . Al Horford had a solid showing as well , finishing with 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) and 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 0 steals over his last three games . Notching a double - double of his own , Al Young finished with 15 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 10 rebounds . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Jarrett Jack , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 110 - 85 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . Indiana came into this game as a sizable favorite and they did n't disappoint . The Nets had just two leads in this game that lasted less than a minute and the final one at the end of the second quarter was followed up by a 33 - 13 run by the Pacers to open things up . The Pacers offense was hot all night , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pacers , as it was a double - digit margin for the majority of the second half . Brooklyn ( 13 - 16 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Jarrett Jack carried the load , as he tallied 22 points , six rebounds and eight assists . David West was second on the team , as he provided 17 points and five rebounds off the bench . George Hill led the starters , as he accrued 20 points , six rebounds and eight assists . George Hill went just 5 - of - 9 from the field , but finished with 12 points , three rebounds and five assists . C.J . Watson was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Toronto Raptors .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 140 - 116 , at Toyota Center on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now , as the Rockets put it to the Clippers in this blowout win . Not only did they score at least 32 points in every quarter , they shot 56 percent from the field against one of the best defenses in the NBA . The Rockets did have a 26 - point lead that was brought down to six in the fourth quarter , but they responded with a 160 run to take control late . Houston took advantage of a happy whistle , as they went 36 - of - 43 from the free - throw line , while Los Angles took just 16 free - throw attempts . The Rockets also won the rebounding ( 45 - 38 ) and assisting ( 29 - 22 ) differential by seven a piece , as they never trailed after the first quarter . The Clippers ( 22 - 13 ) had to play this game without Chris Paul and Blake Griffin , as they were simply outmatched against a hot Rockets bunch . The frustration hit the fan too , as Austin Rivers and Doc Redick were both ejected in the second quarter . Raymond Felton did all he could to keep them hanging around , as he led the team with 26 points , five rebounds and eight assists off the bench . DeAndre Jordan led the starters in his homecoming game , as he totaled 20 points and 13 rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Jamal Crawford and J.J. Redick struggled , as they combined for 13 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting . Marreese Speights played well off the bench , accruing 15 points and seven rebounds . Los Angeles will look to play better on Saturday , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road . The Rockets ( 25 - 9 ) have been dominant on offense all season , but this 140 - spot marked their high of the year . James Harden recorded yet another triple - double , as he accumulated 30 points , 13 rebounds , 10 assists and five steals on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Montrezl Harrell was second on the team , as he dropped a career - high 29 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . Trevor Ariza collected 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists , while Patrick Beverley provided 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists of his own . Eric Gordon led the bench in scoring , dropping 19 points on 5 - of - 7 from three - point range .
The Miami Heat defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 125 - 102 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . Miami were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Heat , as they led by 12 after the first quarter and by 25 headed into halftime . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Miami recorded eight more assists than Philly , while committing six less turnovers . The Heat also dominated the shooting , hitting 59 percent of their shots to the Sixers 42 percent . Ersan Ilyasova led the way for Philadelphia , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic finished with 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , as he provided 16 points , five rebounds and six assists . Ersan Ilyasova was huge off the bench , providing 16 points and six rebounds . The Sixers ( 18 - 32 ) have had a ton of drama surrounding their team and losses like this show just why . Hassan Whiteside did all he could for Philadelphia , as he led the team with 30 points and 20 rebounds . Goran Dragic finished second on the team , accruing 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . T.J. McConnell amassed 11 points , two rebounds and four assists . Tyler Johnson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points , six rebounds and six assists . On deck for Miami is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 33 ) 113 - 86 on Monday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 35 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Magic into 13 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Paul Millsap had a big game as well . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 13 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Dennis Schroder was another player who had a solid showing . He recorded his third double - double of the year , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . Aaron Gordon had a solid showing as well , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Monday at the Moda Center in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 37 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Trail Blazers went just 47 percent . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Trail Blazers 45 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . In only his second game of the season though , DeMar DeRozan finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 28 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding 11 assists . He 's now averaging 14 points per game on the season . Despite struggling with his shot , Damian Lillard had a huge night , scoring 27 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , while adding 11 assists and five rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Allen McCollum had 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three assists as well . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Wednesday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . The Sixers were led by Robert Covington 's 16 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight rebounds , two steals and a block . T.J. McConnell supplied 12 points , nine assists , two rebounds and three steals . Nik Stauskas supplied 10 points , four boards , four assists and one steal . Nik Stauskas led the bench with 10 points , two boards , four assists and one steal . Marcus Morris paced the Pistons with 28 points , two rebounds , one assist and one block . Robert Covington totaled 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . T.J. McConnell supplied 12 points , nine boards , nine assists and two steals . Tobias Harris went for 14 points , nine boards , one assist , two steals and two blocks . Reggie Jackson went for 10 points , one rebound , three assists and two steals . Tobias Harris led the second unit with 14 points , nine boards , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Reggie Jackson tallied 10 points , three assists , one rebound and two steals .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 32 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) 108 - 90 on Saturday . A thoroughly dominating performance by Miami was perhaps to be expected , considering that the Heat came into the game surrendering the second - lowest amount of points per game ( 97 ) , while the Hawks checked in with the second - highest turnover rate ( 12 ) on a nightly basis . Both figures proved to be prophetic Thursday , as the Heat held Atlanta to a season - low scoring total , and also set a season - best total in points surrendered . The Heat elicted 10 turnovers from the Hawks as well , and held them to 38 percent and 24 percent success rates from the floor and three - point range , respectively . The Hawks were led by Tyler Johnson 's 23 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , five assists and a steal . Dion Waiters tallied 14 points , 10 assists , three rebounds , two blocks and a steal . Willie Reed followed with a near double - double of 12 points , nine rebounds and a steal in just 23 minutes . The Hawks remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again against the Bulls on Wednesday . The Hawks are spearheaded by a pair of 21 - point efforts from their starting backcourt of Goran Dragic and Tyler Johnson . The former also added one rebound , an assist and a steal , while the latter supplied four rebounds , five assists and a steal . Dion Waiters tallied 14 points , 10 assists , three rebounds , two blocks and a steal . Willie Reed managed 12 points and six rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Hawks remain in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Miami to take on the Heat on Wednesday . Miami 's attack was spearheaded by Johnson , who supplied 23 points , five rebounds , five assists and a steal . Goran Dragic was next with 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , a steal and two blocks . Dion Waiters tallied 14 points , 10 assists , three rebounds , a steal and a block . Tim Bazemore , who 'd been questionable coming in with a sore Achilles , nevertheless tallied a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . Willie Reed came off the bench to supply 12 points and 10 rebounds over a reserve role as well . The Hawks remain in first place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are currently in possession of the sixth seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Tuesday versus the Miami Heat .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 43 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) 121 - 116 on Monday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a result like this and it was well out of hand early . In fact , the Timberwolves had a 26 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . Minnesota was led by a big performance from Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 27 points , 10 rebounds and five assists in the victory . The team was led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who totaled 27 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks in the loss . This is a trend that is becoming all too common for the Suns and they simply need more from these two , especially against teams like the Timberwolves . Andrew LaVine had one of his best games of the season as well , as he amassed 19 points , four rebounds and two assists in the defeat . The Timberwolves have a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in their next game . Minnesota has been struggling recently , but they showed some great resiliency in this game against a talented Phoenix team . Karl-Anthony Towns was a beast in this game , as he amassed 27 points and 10 rebounds in the victory . Ricky Rubio also had a good all - around game , as he accumulated 17 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists in the win . Up next for the Timberwolves is a matchup with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday . The Suns got some great performances from their studs here , but it was one again the defense that let them down . Not only did they allow 121 turnovers , they allowed Minnesota to shoot 51 percent from the field and 27 percent from long distance . Karl-Anthony Towns was one of the lone bright spots for the Suns , as he tallied 27 points , 10 rebounds and two steals in the loss . Alex Len also played well off the bench , as he amassed 14 points and 13 rebounds en route to a double - double . These teams will have a rematch on December 9th in Minnesota .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 112 - 94 on Saturday . Portland is on a two - game win streak , but Wednesday 's win came with a special meaning for the Blazers as it was the first game they 've played this season without Robin Lopez . Lopez is expected to miss up to two months with a broken right hand . Anthony Davis returned to the starting lineup after missing Saturday 's contest due to a sore right Achilles . He led the Pelicans with 25 points to go along with 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks in 41 minutes . Portland has now won six of its last seven games . With Al Jefferson still sidelined with a knee injury , Meyers Leonard stepped into the starting lineup and put up 12 points and eight rebounds in 34 minutes . CJ McCollum led all scorers with 37 points , going 14 - for - 22 from the field . Damian Lillard ( 21 ) was the only other starter to score in double figures , while Ish Smith scored 7 points and dished out eight assists in 29 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will stay at home to take on the Nets on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will head to San Antonio Wednesday to play the Spurs , while the Pelicans will travel to Memphis Saturday to take on the Grizzlies in a matchup with two of their best matchups in the NBA . The Pelicans will play the Lakers in Memphis on Tuesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 36 , the Jazz came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Jazz 27 - 21 , to steal the 23 - point victory on the road . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 36 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Jazz into 23 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . Curry went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also handing out four assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 6 times , and converted on 6 - of - 5 attempts at the free throw line . Klay Thompson also did his best to keep the Jazz in this game , going 8 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 17 points . It was a nice surprise for the Jazz , as he 's averaging only 5 points per game so far this season . Joe Johnson chipped in with 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , but did n't do much else with only one rebound and one assist . The Jazz ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 128 - 119 on Friday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . In a meeting of Southwest Division foes , the Grizzlies were able to push past the Warriors in a tough overtime victory and move to the top of their division standings . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went 49 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Grizzlies into 16 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Zach Randolph had his way with the Warriors ' bigs . He went 12 - of - 17 from the field to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 27 points and 17 rebounds on the season . Klay Thompson was the only other Grizzlies ' player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 11 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , 12 rebounds and three assists in 48 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday , while the Warriors will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
